parts.name: Picture description
parts.title: For each question, you will see a picture and you will hear four short statements. The statements will be spoken just one time. They will not be printed in your test book so you must listen carefully to understand what the speaker says. When you hear the four statements, look at the picture and choose the statement that best describes what you see in the picture. Choose the best answer A, B, C or D

intro.title:
EXAMPLE:
Now listen to the four statements.
Statement (D) best describes what you see in the picture.
Therefore, you should choose answer (D).
intro.answers: ["A. He is on the phone","B. She is driving the car","C. She is typing on the computer","D. He is sitting next to her"]

parts.name: Question - response
parts.title: In this part of the test, you will hear a question or statement spoken in English, followed by three responses, also spoken in English. The question or statement and the responses will be spoken just one time. They will not be printed in your test book, so you must listen carefully. You are to choose the best response to each question or statement.

intro.title:
You will hear:
Why are you late?
intro.answers: ["A. I hope I won't be","B. My car broke down","C. He alway is"]
intro.explains: The best response is choice B. "My car broke down". Therefore, you should choose B.

questions.text_audio:
Which shoes are on sale this weekend?
A. That’s a good choice.
B. The ones on this table.
C. I checked her résumé.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

Nh\u1eefng \u0111ôi giày nào \u0111ang \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c gi\u1ea3m giá vào cu\u1ed1i tu\u1ea7n này?<\/p>

A. \u0110ó là m\u1ed9t l\u1ef1a ch\u1ecdn t\u1ed1t.<\/p>

B. Nh\u1eefng cái trên bàn này.<\/p>

C. Tôi \u0111ã ki\u1ec3m tra lý l\u1ecbch c\u1ee7a cô \u1ea5y.<\/p>"}
questions.title: Listen and choose the best answer:

childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Which shoes - The ones<\/p>","en":"

Which shoes - The ones<\/p>"}

B. Trên th\u1ef1c t\u1ebf, không ai trong s\u1ed1 h\u1ecd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c.<\/p>

C. Tôi s\u1ebd thanh toán ngay bây gi\u1edd.<\/p>"}

questions.title: Listen and choose the best answer:

parts.name: Short conversations
parts.title: You will hear some conversations between two people. You will be asked to answer three questions about what the speakers say in each conversation. Select the best response to each question and mark the letter (A), (B), (C) or (D) on your answer sheet. The conversations will not be printed in your test book and will be spoken only one time.

questions.text_audio:
A: Hi, (32) if you’re ready to check out, I can help you at register two.

B: Thanks. By the way, (33) I saw a sign in front of the grocery store about a new delivery service?

A: Oh, right. We’re offering a service where you can have your groceries delivered to your home.

B: That sounds really convenient, but (33) does it cost a lot?

A: It’s actually not that expensive. (34) Let me see if I can find a flyer with the rates.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

A: Xin chào, n\u1ebfu anh \u0111ã s\u1eb5n sàng thanh toán, tôi có th\u1ec3 giúp anh khi \u0111\u0103ng ký hai.<\/p>

B: C\u1ea3m \u01a1n. Nhân ti\u1ec7n, tôi th\u1ea5y m\u1ed9t b\u1ea3ng hi\u1ec7u tr\u01b0\u1edbc c\u1eeda hàng t\u1ea1p hóa v\u1ec1 d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 giao hàng m\u1edbi?<\/p>

A: \u1ed2, \u0111úng. Chúng tôi \u0111ang cung c\u1ea5p d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 mà anh có th\u1ec3 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c giao hàng t\u1ea1p hóa \u0111\u1ebfn t\u1eadn nhà.<\/p>

B: Nghe có v\u1ebb r\u1ea5t ti\u1ec7n l\u1ee3i \u0111\u1ea5y, nh\u01b0ng có t\u1ed1n nhi\u1ec1u ti\u1ec1n không?<\/p>

A: Nó không th\u1ef1c \u0111\u1eaft nh\u01b0 v\u1eady. \u0110\u1ec3 tôi xem có th\u1ec3 tìm th\u1ea5y t\u1edd r\u01a1i v\u1ec1 các m\u1ee9c giá không.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
A: Excuse me. (35) This is my first visit to the Chesterville Art Museum. Are there any guided tours? 
B: There aren’t any guided tours available today, unfortunately. But, (36) we do have a museum app for your mobile phone. If you download it, you can read facts about each of the items in our galleries.
A: OK, great. I’ll do that. Oh, and (37) are there any maps?
B: Sure, (37) here you go. It’s recently been updated to include the exhibits in our newly opened east wing.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

A: Xin l\u1ed7i. \u0110ây là chuy\u1ebfn tham quan \u0111\u1ea7u tiên c\u1ee7a tôi \u0111\u1ebfn B\u1ea3o tàng Ngh\u1ec7 thu\u1eadt Chesterville. Có chuy\u1ebfn tham quan nào có h\u01b0\u1edbng d\u1eabn viên không?<\/p>

B: R\u1ea5t ti\u1ebfc, không có chuy\u1ebfn tham quan có h\u01b0\u1edbng d\u1eabn nào hôm nay. Tuy nhiên, chúng tôi có m\u1ed9t \u1ee9ng d\u1ee5ng b\u1ea3o tàng cho \u0111i\u1ec7n tho\u1ea1i di \u0111\u1ed9ng. N\u1ebfu cô t\u1ea3i xu\u1ed1ng, cô có th\u1ec3 \u0111\u1ecdc thông tin th\u1ef1c t\u1ebf v\u1ec1 t\u1eebng v\u1eadt trong các phòng tr\u01b0ng bày c\u1ee7a chúng tôi.<\/p>

A: \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c, tuy\u1ec7t v\u1eddi. Tôi s\u1ebd t\u1ea3i xu\u1ed1ng. \u1ed2, và có b\u1ea3n \u0111\u1ed3 nào không?<\/p>

B: Ch\u1eafc ch\u1eafn r\u1ed3i, c\u1ee7a cô \u0111ây. Nó g\u1ea7n \u0111ây \u0111ã \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c c\u1eadp nh\u1eadt có thêm các cu\u1ed9c tri\u1ec3n lãm trong cánh phía \u0111ông m\u1edbi m\u1edf c\u1ee7a chúng tôi. <\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
A: Mr. Baxter? (38) l’m Nadia Alaoui—I manage this radio station. And this is Karen Wilson, the host of our morning broadcast. Please sit down.
B: Nice to meet you both. (39) Thank you for considering me for a job as a news writer.
W-Br It’s our pleasure. The writing samples you submitted were impressive… especially since many of them were about world events.
A: Right. If you get the job, you’d be covering international issues, which means (40) you’d have to travel a lot. Would that be a problem for you?
B: Not at all. In my previous position as a magazine journalist, I went to a different country almost every month, so (40) I’m very comfortable with working overseas.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

A: Anh Baxter? Tôi là Nadia Alaoui — Tôi qu\u1ea3n lý \u0111ài phát thanh này. Và \u0111ây là Karen Wilson, ng\u01b0\u1eddi d\u1eabn ch\u01b0\u01a1ng trình bu\u1ed5i sáng c\u1ee7a chúng tôi. M\u1eddi anh ng\u1ed3i.<\/p>

B: R\u1ea5t vui \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c g\u1eb7p c\u1ea3 hai cô. C\u1ea3m \u01a1n các cô \u0111ã cân nh\u1eafc tôi cho v\u1ecb trí ng\u01b0\u1eddi vi\u1ebft tin t\u1ee9c.<\/p>

W-Br: \u0110ó là vinh h\u1ea1nh c\u1ee7a chúng tôi. Các m\u1eabu vi\u1ebft anh g\u1eedi r\u1ea5t \u1ea5n t\u01b0\u1ee3ng… \u0111\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t là vì nhi\u1ec1u m\u1eabu vi\u1ebft v\u1ec1 các s\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi.<\/p>

A: \u0110úng v\u1eady. N\u1ebfu anh nh\u1eadn công vi\u1ec7c, anh s\u1ebd ch\u1ecbu trách nhi\u1ec7m m\u1ea3ng các v\u1ea5n \u0111\u1ec1 qu\u1ed1c t\u1ebf, \u0111i\u1ec1u \u0111ó có ngh\u0129a là anh s\u1ebd ph\u1ea3i \u0111i r\u1ea5t nhi\u1ec1u n\u01a1i. Có v\u1ea5n \u0111\u1ec1 gì v\u1edbi anh không?<\/p>

B: Không h\u1ec1. \u1ede v\u1ecb trí phóng viên t\u1ea1p chí tr\u01b0\u1edbc \u0111ây c\u1ee7a tôi, h\u1ea7u nh\u01b0 tháng nào tôi c\u0169ng \u0111\u1ebfn m\u1ed9t qu\u1ed1c gia khác, vì v\u1eady tôi r\u1ea5t tho\u1ea3i mái khi làm vi\u1ec7c \u1edf n\u01b0\u1edbc ngoài.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
A: (41) John, there’re some hotel guests arriving at the airport tomorrow, around eleven thirty. Can you take the hotel van and pick them up then?
B: Of course. Are they arriving at the domestic or international terminal?
A: Both—three are coming in on local flights, two on international. (42) Here’s a list of the guests’ names and their arrival Information:.
B: OK, great. By the way, I sent you an e-mail about the upcoming holiday. (43) I was hoping to take a few days off…
A: I did see your e-mail. We have enough people to cover your shifts.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

A: John, có m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 khách c\u1ee7a khách s\u1ea1n \u0111\u1ebfn sân bay vào ngày mai, kho\u1ea3ng 11 gi\u1edd 30. Anh có th\u1ec3 l\u1ea5y xe van c\u1ee7a khách s\u1ea1n và \u0111ón h\u1ecd lúc \u0111ó không?<\/p>

B: T\u1ea5t nhiên r\u1ed3i. H\u1ecd s\u1ebd \u0111\u1ebfn nhà ga n\u1ed9i \u0111\u1ecba hay nhà ga qu\u1ed1c t\u1ebf?<\/p>

A: C\u1ea3 hai — ba chuy\u1ebfn bay \u0111\u1ecba ph\u01b0\u01a1ng, hai chuy\u1ebfn bay qu\u1ed1c t\u1ebf. D\u01b0\u1edbi \u0111ây là danh sách tên c\u1ee7a khách và thông tin \u0111\u1ebfn c\u1ee7a h\u1ecd.<\/p>

B: \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c r\u1ed3i, tuy\u1ec7t. Nhân ti\u1ec7n, tôi \u0111ã g\u1eedi email cho cô xin k\u1ef3 ngh\u1ec9 phép s\u1eafp t\u1edbi. Tôi \u0111ã hy v\u1ecdng \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ngh\u1ec9 vài ngày…<\/p>

A: Tôi \u0111ã xem e-mail c\u1ee7a anh. Chúng ta có \u0111\u1ee7 ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111\u1ec3 làm c\u1ea3 ca c\u1ee7a anh.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
A: Heather, (44) have you bought the plane tickets for our trip to the trade show in Mexico City?
B: I haven’t yet—(45) tickets are expensive right now, so I figured I’d wait to buy them to see if the prices go down.
A: Did you try Baseline Airways? It’s usually about 25 percent cheaper than other airlines.
B: Wow—how can they offer such low prices?
A: Well, they charge a lot for additional services. For instance, taking a large suitcase costs 50 dollars. But we usually travel light, so it could be a good option for us.
B: (46) In that case. I’ll check out their Web site. Thanks for the advice!
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

A: Heather, cô \u0111ã mua vé máy bay cho chuy\u1ebfn \u0111i c\u1ee7a chúng ta \u0111\u1ebfn tri\u1ec3n lãm th\u01b0\u01a1ng m\u1ea1i \u1edf Mexico City ch\u01b0a?<\/p>

B: Tôi v\u1eabn ch\u01b0a— vé hi\u1ec7n \u0111ang \u0111\u1eaft, vì v\u1eady tôi ngh\u0129 mình s\u1ebd \u0111\u1ee3i \u0111\u1ec3 xem giá có gi\u1ea3m không.<\/p>

A: Cô \u0111ã xem th\u1eed hãng Hàng không Baseline ch\u01b0a? Vé th\u01b0\u1eddng r\u1ebb h\u01a1n kho\u1ea3ng 25% so v\u1edbi các hãng hàng không khác.<\/p>

B: Wow - làm sao h\u1ecd có th\u1ec3 \u0111\u01b0a ra m\u1ee9c giá th\u1ea5p nh\u01b0 v\u1eady nh\u1ec9?<\/p>

A: Chà, h\u1ecd tính phí r\u1ea5t nhi\u1ec1u cho các d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 b\u1ed5 sung. Ví d\u1ee5, l\u1ea5y m\u1ed9t chi\u1ebfc vali l\u1edbn có giá 50 \u0111ô la. Nh\u01b0ng chúng ta th\u01b0\u1eddng \u0111i l\u1ea1i nh\u1eb9 nhàng, vì v\u1eady \u0111ây có th\u1ec3 là m\u1ed9t l\u1ef1a ch\u1ecdn t\u1ed1t cho chúng ta.<\/p>

B: Trong tr\u01b0\u1eddng h\u1ee3p \u0111ó. Tôi s\u1ebd ki\u1ec3m tra trang web c\u1ee7a h\u1ecd. C\u1ea3m \u01a1n vì l\u1eddi khuyên!<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
A: Hi, my name is Riccardo Messina. (47) l have an appointment with Dr. Schmidt today, and I was told to come fifteen minutes early to fill out medical forms.
B: Yes, they’re here on this clipboard. The form on the top gives us permission to ask for a copy of your medical records from your previous doctor.
A: OK, (48) but my previous doctor moved to another town. I don’t know where she’s working now.
B: Oh, that’s not a problem. The clinic where she practiced in town will have the records we need. Now let’s see… (49) you’re here today about your ankle, is that right?
A: (49) Yeah, I seem to have hurt it while I was running last week.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

A: Xin chào, tôi là Riccardo Messina. Hôm nay tôi có cu\u1ed9c h\u1eb9n v\u1edbi bác s\u0129 Schmidt, và tôi \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c b\u1ea3o \u0111\u1ebfn s\u1edbm m\u01b0\u1eddi l\u0103m phút \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111i\u1ec1n vào các m\u1eabu \u0111\u01a1n y t\u1ebf.<\/p>

B: Có, chúng \u0111ang \u1edf \u0111ây trên khay nh\u1edb t\u1ea1m th\u1eddi này. Bi\u1ec3u m\u1eabu \u1edf trên cùng cho phép chúng tôi yêu c\u1ea7u m\u1ed9t b\u1ea3n sao h\u1ed3 s\u01a1 y t\u1ebf c\u1ee7a anh t\u1eeb bác s\u0129 tr\u01b0\u1edbc \u0111ây.<\/p>

A: \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c, nh\u01b0ng bác s\u0129 tr\u01b0\u1edbc \u0111ây c\u1ee7a tôi \u0111ã chuy\u1ec3n \u0111\u1ebfn th\u1ecb tr\u1ea5n khác. Tôi không bi\u1ebft cô \u1ea5y \u0111ang làm vi\u1ec7c \u1edf \u0111âu.<\/p>

B: \u1ed2, không thành v\u1ea5n \u0111\u1ec1. Phòng khám n\u01a1i cô \u1ea5y hành ngh\u1ec1 trong th\u1ecb tr\u1ea5n s\u1ebd có nh\u1eefng h\u1ed3 s\u01a1 mà chúng tôi c\u1ea7n. Bây gi\u1edd chúng ta hãy xem… hôm nay anh \u1edf \u0111ây \u0111\u1ec3 khám m\u1eaft cá chân ph\u1ea3i không?<\/p>

A: Vâng, tôi có v\u1ebb \u0111ã b\u1ecb th\u01b0\u01a1ng khi \u0111i ch\u1ea1y tu\u1ea7n tr\u01b0\u1edbc.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
A: Hi, Ms. Lee. My crew just finished installing the windows on your house. If things go according to plan, (50) we might complete construction before the deadline in the contract.

B: Thanks for letting me know, John. I’m very impressed with your team’s work. By the way, (51) has the shipment of wood for the flooring arrived yet?

A: (51), (52) Yes, the wood arrived this morning — it’s stacked over there.

B: Great! Well, (52) it’s supposed to rain later today. You have the key to the storage unit, right?
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

A: Chào cô Lee. \u0110\u1ed9i c\u1ee7a tôi v\u1eeba hoàn thành vi\u1ec7c l\u1eafp c\u1eeda s\u1ed5 cho ngôi nhà c\u1ee7a cô. N\u1ebfu m\u1ecdi th\u1ee9 di\u1ec5n ra theo \u0111úng k\u1ebf ho\u1ea1ch, chúng tôi có th\u1ec3 hoàn thành vi\u1ec7c l\u1eafp \u0111\u1eb7t tr\u01b0\u1edbc th\u1eddi h\u1ea1n trong h\u1ee3p \u0111\u1ed3ng.<\/p>

B: C\u1ea3m \u01a1n vì \u0111ã cho tôi bi\u1ebft, John. Tôi r\u1ea5t \u1ea5n t\u01b0\u1ee3ng v\u1edbi \u0111\u1ed9i c\u1ee7a anh. Nhân ti\u1ec7n, lô hàng g\u1ed7 lát sàn \u0111ã \u0111\u1ebfn ch\u01b0a v\u1eady?<\/p>

A: Vâng, g\u1ed7 \u0111ã \u0111\u1ebfn vào sáng nay - nó \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ch\u1ea5t \u1edf \u0111\u1eb1ng kia.<\/p>

B: Tuy\u1ec7t v\u1eddi! Chà, hôm nay tr\u1eddi có l\u1ebd s\u1ebd m\u01b0a. Anh có chìa khóa c\u1ee7a \u0111\u01a1n v\u1ecb l\u01b0u tr\u1eef ph\u1ea3i không?<\/p>"}

childrens.answers: ["She wants a door to remain locked.","She wants to inspect a facility.","She wants the man to put some supplies away.","She wants to confirm that only one key exists."]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Ng\u01b0\u1eddi ph\u1ee5 n\u1eef có ý gì khi cô \u1ea5y nói, B\u1ea1n có chìa khóa c\u1ee7a kho l\u01b0u tr\u1eef, ph\u1ea3i không?<\/p>

A. Cô \u1ea5y mu\u1ed1n m\u1ed9t cánh c\u1eeda v\u1eabn b\u1ecb khóa.<\/p>

B. Cô \u1ea5y mu\u1ed1n ki\u1ec3m tra m\u1ed9t c\u01a1 s\u1edf.<\/p>

C. Cô \u1ea5y mu\u1ed1n ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111àn ông c\u1ea5t \u0111i m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 \u0111\u1ed3.<\/p>

D. Cô \u1ea5y mu\u1ed1n xác nh\u1eadn r\u1eb1ng ch\u1ec9 có m\u1ed9t chìa khóa.<\/p>###

Thông tin:<\/p>

[...] it’s supposed to rain later today.<\/p>","en":"

A. She wants a door to remain locked.<\/p>

questions.text_audio:
A: Hi, Ms. Watanabe. It’s Hassan. I’m returning your call. (53) You asked if I could update the mobile application that I created for your clothing store?
B: Yes, that’s right. (54) Customers using our app have increased by over 500 percent this year.
A: That’s great!
B: Yes, (54) but now the application runs very slow when too many people use it at the same time. I’d like you to update it to support more users.
A: I’m sure I could change the app’s code to handle more users, but it’ll take some time. (55) Let me look into it, and by the end of the day I’ll let you know how long it’ll take.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

A: Xin chào, cô Watanabe. Là Hassan. Tôi \u0111ang g\u1ecdi l\u1ea1i cho cô. Cô \u0111ã h\u1ecfi tôi có th\u1ec3 c\u1eadp nh\u1eadt \u1ee9ng d\u1ee5ng di \u0111\u1ed9ng mà tôi \u0111ã t\u1ea1o cho c\u1eeda hàng qu\u1ea7n áo c\u1ee7a cô không.<\/p>

B: Vâng, \u0111úng v\u1eady. Khách hàng s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng \u1ee9ng d\u1ee5ng c\u1ee7a chúng tôi \u0111ã t\u0103ng h\u01a1n 500% trong n\u0103m nay.<\/p>

A: Th\u1eadt tuy\u1ec7t!<\/p>

B: Vâng, nh\u01b0ng bây gi\u1edd \u1ee9ng d\u1ee5ng ch\u1ea1y r\u1ea5t ch\u1eadm khi có quá nhi\u1ec1u ng\u01b0\u1eddi s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng cùng m\u1ed9t lúc. Tôi mu\u1ed1n anh c\u1eadp nh\u1eadt nó \u0111\u1ec3 h\u1ed7 tr\u1ee3 nhi\u1ec1u ng\u01b0\u1eddi dùng h\u01a1n.<\/p>

\u0110: Tôi \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o mình có th\u1ec3 thay \u0111\u1ed5i mã c\u1ee7a \u1ee9ng d\u1ee5ng \u0111\u1ec3 x\u1eed lý nhi\u1ec1u ng\u01b0\u1eddi dùng h\u01a1n, nh\u01b0ng s\u1ebd m\u1ea5t m\u1ed9t chút th\u1eddi gian. \u0110\u1ec3 tôi ki\u1ec3m tra, và vào cu\u1ed1i ngày, tôi s\u1ebd cho cô bi\u1ebft s\u1ebd m\u1ea5t bao lâu.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
A: Hi Miguel. (56) Did you see that a new fitness center opened down the road from the office?
B: (56) Yes! I saw it while I was driving here yesterday. (57) It’s great to have a place to go and work out so close by.
A: (57) Exactly. And I heard that (58) if you join this month, you’ll get a twenty percent discount on any exercise gear you purchase.
B: Really? I’ve been thinking about starting an exercise routine. Maybe I should check it out this week.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

A: Chào Miguel. C\u1eadu có th\u1ea5y m\u1ed9t trung tâm th\u1ec3 d\u1ee5c m\u1edbi \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c m\u1edf ngay g\u1ea7n v\u0103n phòng không?<\/p>

B: Có! Tôi \u0111ã th\u1ea5y nó khi\u0111ang lái xe \u1edf \u0111ây ngày hôm qua. Th\u1eadt tuy\u1ec7t khi có m\u1ed9t n\u01a1i \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111\u1ebfn và t\u1eadp luy\u1ec7n nh\u01b0 v\u1eady.<\/p>

A: Chính xác. Và tôi nghe nói n\u1ebfu c\u1eadu tham gia vào tháng này, c\u1eadu s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c gi\u1ea3m giá 20% cho b\u1ea5t k\u1ef3 d\u1ee5ng c\u1ee5 t\u1eadp th\u1ec3 d\u1ee5c nào c\u1eadu mua.<\/p>

B: Th\u1eadt không? Tôi \u0111ã suy ngh\u0129 v\u1ec1 vi\u1ec7c b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u thói quen t\u1eadp th\u1ec3 d\u1ee5c. Có l\u1ebd tôi s\u1ebd qua \u0111ó th\u1eed xem trong tu\u1ea7n này.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
A: Thanks for coming out to our factory in such bad weather!
B: No problem. (59) We’re used to working in all kinds of weather.
C: We sure are! So… (60) my notes say that you’ve noticed some damage on some of the pipes outside building two. Is that right?
A: Yes. I noticed some rust spots. I’ll show you exactly where.
C: OK—(60) we’ll take a look and let you know how extensive the damage is.
B: It’s possible it’s just surface-level rust. But… (61) you should know that if repairs are needed, operations in building two will have to be shut down for a couple of days while we do the work.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

A: C\u1ea3m \u01a1n \u0111ã \u0111\u1ebfn nhà máy c\u1ee7a chúng tôi trong th\u1eddi ti\u1ebft x\u1ea5u nh\u01b0 v\u1eady!<\/p>

B: Không sao. Chúng tôi \u0111ã quen làm vi\u1ec7c trong m\u1ecdi \u0111i\u1ec1u ki\u1ec7n th\u1eddi ti\u1ebft.<\/p>

C: Chúng ta ch\u1eafc ch\u1eafn nh\u01b0 v\u1eady r\u1ed3i! Vì v\u1eady… ghi chú c\u1ee7a tôi nói r\u1eb1ng anh \u0111ã nh\u1eadn th\u1ea5y h\u01b0 h\u1ecfng \u1edf m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng \u1ed1ng bên ngoài Tòa 2. Có \u0111úng không?<\/p>

A: Vâng. Tôi nh\u1eadn th\u1ea5y m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 \u0111i\u1ec3m r\u1ec9 sét. Tôi s\u1ebd ch\u1ec9 cho anh chính xác v\u1ecb trí.<\/p>

C: \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c — chúng tôi s\u1ebd xem xét và cho anh bi\u1ebft m\u1ee9c \u0111\u1ed9 h\u01b0 h\u1ecfng l\u1edbn nh\u01b0 th\u1ebf nào.<\/p>

B: Có th\u1ec3 \u0111ó ch\u1ec9 là r\u1ec9 sét \u1edf m\u1ee9c \u0111\u1ed9 b\u1ec1 m\u1eb7t. Nh\u01b0ng… anh nên bi\u1ebft n\u1ebfu c\u1ea7n s\u1eeda ch\u1eefa, các ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng trong Tòa 2 s\u1ebd ph\u1ea3i ng\u1eebng ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng trong vài ngày trong khi chúng tôi ti\u1ebfn hành công vi\u1ec7c.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
A: (62) My movie’s about to start, but I’m so hungry! Do you have any specials today?

B: Yes, they’re on this sign. (63) Depending on what food item you buy, you receive a free soft drink. For example, if you buy candy, you get a free small drink. If you buy…

A: Oh, I see. Well, (63) I’ll go with popcorn.

B: That’ll be seven dollars.

A: Also, (64) I have a gift certificate here. Can I pay with it?

B: (64) Yes. It’s OK to use your certificate for the specials.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

A: Phim c\u1ee7a tôi s\u1eafp b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u, mà tôi \u0111ói quá! Hôm nay cô có khuy\u1ebfn m\u1ea1i nào không?<\/p>

B: Có, chúng \u1edf trên b\u1ea3ng hi\u1ec7u này. Tùy thu\u1ed9c vào \u0111\u1ed3 anh mua, anh s\u1ebd nh\u1eadn \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c m\u1ed9t n\u01b0\u1edbc ng\u1ecdt mi\u1ec5n phí. Ch\u1eb3ng h\u1ea1n, n\u1ebfu anh mua k\u1eb9o, anh s\u1ebd nh\u1eadn \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c m\u1ed9t \u0111\u1ed3 u\u1ed1ng nh\u1ecf mi\u1ec5n phí. N\u1ebfu anh mua…<\/p>

A: \u1ed2, tôi hi\u1ec3u r\u1ed3i. Chà, tôi s\u1ebd l\u1ea5y b\u1ecfng ngô.<\/p>

B: H\u1ebft b\u1ea3y \u0111ô la.<\/p>

A: À mà tôi có m\u1ed9t phi\u1ebfu quà t\u1eb7ng \u1edf \u0111ây. Tôi có th\u1ec3 dùng nó \u0111\u1ec3 thanh toán không?<\/p>

B: Vâng. Anh có th\u1ec3 s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng phi\u1ebfu cho các ch\u01b0\u01a1ng trình \u0111\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
A: Excuse me, Bridget?
B: Yes?
A: (65) I just received an e-mail from a senior executive at Destra Incorporated. It’s about their visit to our headquarters next month. They have a special request for the itinerary.
B: I’m almost done with it, but (65) I guess I can shift some plans around. (66) What did the client ask for?
A: (66) They want to go on a hike nearby. They’ve heard how beautiful it is here during this time of the year.
B: I know a good hiking spot. But (67) I’ll have to cancel one of the other activities in order to fit it in. Maybe the visit to the art museum?
A: Good idea. The basketball game is usually more popularthan the museum.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

A: Xin l\u1ed7i, Bridget?<\/p>

B: Vâng?<\/p>

A: Tôi v\u1eeba nh\u1eadn \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c e-mail t\u1eeb m\u1ed9t giám \u0111\u1ed1c \u0111i\u1ec1u hành c\u1ea5p cao t\u1ea1i Destra Incorporated. V\u1ec1 chuy\u1ebfn th\u0103m c\u1ee7a h\u1ecd \u0111\u1ebfn tr\u1ee5 s\u1edf c\u1ee7a chúng ta vào tháng t\u1edbi. H\u1ecd có m\u1ed9t yêu c\u1ea7u \u0111\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t cho hành trình.<\/p>

B: Tôi s\u1eafp xong r\u1ed3i, nh\u01b0ng tôi ngh\u0129 có th\u1ec3 thay \u0111\u1ed5i m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 k\u1ebf ho\u1ea1ch. (66) Khách hàng yêu c\u1ea7u gì?<\/p>

A: H\u1ecd mu\u1ed1n \u0111i b\u1ed9 \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng dài g\u1ea7n \u0111ó. H\u1ecd \u0111ã nghe nói th\u1eddi gian này trong n\u0103m \u1edf \u0111ây \u0111\u1eb9p nh\u01b0 th\u1ebf nào.<\/p>

B: Tôi bi\u1ebft m\u1ed9t \u0111i\u1ec3m \u0111i b\u1ed9 \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng dài t\u1ed1t. Nh\u01b0ng tôi s\u1ebd ph\u1ea3i h\u1ee7y m\u1ed9t trong nh\u1eefng ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng khác \u0111\u1ec3 phù h\u1ee3p. Có th\u1ec3 là chuy\u1ebfn tham quan b\u1ea3o tàng ngh\u1ec7 thu\u1eadt?<\/p>

A: Ý ki\u1ebfn hay. Ch\u01a1i bóng r\u1ed5 th\u01b0\u1eddng ph\u1ed5 bi\u1ebfn h\u01a1n \u0111i b\u1ea3o tàng. <\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
A: Hi, Brian, and welcome! I’m Cindy Stapleton, and I’ll be your manager. (68) I assume you remember the general floor layout from when you interviewed here? We have a few available offices on this floor that you can choose from.
B: Thanks! I’d like to have a quiet work space. if possible. Any recommendations?
A: Hm. Office One is taken… and it’s probably noisy by the kitchen or near the conference room. (69) How about the office right here, next to the front door?
B: Great! Thanks. Now—(70) how do I log into the computer network?
A: Oh, (70) we’ll do that later. Once you’ve settled in, come by my desk. Then I’ll show you how to log in.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

A: Chào Brian và chào m\u1eebng anh! Tôi là Cindy Stapleton và tôi s\u1ebd là qu\u1ea3n lý c\u1ee7a anh. Tôi ngh\u0129 là anh nh\u1edb cách b\u1ed1 trí t\u1ea7ng chung khi anh ph\u1ecfng v\u1ea5n \u1edf \u0111ây? Chúng tôi có m\u1ed9t vài v\u0103n phòng tr\u1ed1ng trên t\u1ea7ng này mà anh có th\u1ec3 ch\u1ecdn.<\/p>

B: C\u1ea3m \u01a1n! Tôi mu\u1ed1n có m\u1ed9t không gian làm vi\u1ec7c yên t\u0129nh. N\u1ebfu có th\u1ec3. Có gi\u1edbi thi\u1ec7u nào không?<\/p>

A: H\u1eebm. Office 1 \u0111\u1ec3 xem … nó có th\u1ec3 \u1ed3n ào t\u1eeb nhà b\u1ebfp ho\u1eb7c g\u1ea7n phòng h\u1ecdp. Còn v\u0103n phòng ngay \u0111ây, c\u1ea1nh c\u1eeda tr\u01b0\u1edbc thì sao?<\/p>

B: Tuy\u1ec7t v\u1eddi! C\u1ea3m \u01a1n. Bây gi\u1edd— (70) làm cách nào \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111\u0103ng nh\u1eadp vào m\u1ea1ng máy tính v\u1eady?<\/p>

A: \u1ed2, chúng ta s\u1ebd làm sau. Khi anh \u0111ã \u1ed5n \u0111\u1ecbnh, hãy \u0111\u1ebfn ch\u1ed7 tôi. Sau \u0111ó, tôi s\u1ebd ch\u1ec9 cho anh cách \u0111\u0103ng nh\u1eadp.<\/p>"}

parts.name: Short talks
parts.title: You will hear some talks given by a single speaker. You will be asked to answer three questions about what the speaker says in each talk. Select the best response to each question and mark the letter (A), (B), (C) or (D) on your answer sheet. The talks will not be printed in your test book and will be spoken only one time.

questions.text_audio: M-Au (71) Welcome to Vandermark Farms! We’re happy you can work for us this summer. Each of you will be assigned to a team responsible for different tasks on our farm. Like last summer, you may be assigned to be in the fields or to care for the animals. (72) We do have a new task this year – a food cart. We’ll need people to run it and sell our fresh products around town. Although these are seasonal positions, we always have openings for year-round work. If you’re interested, (73) just e-mail Anya, and she’ll give you a listing of all our available twelve-month positions.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

M-Au: Chào m\u1eebng \u0111\u1ebfn v\u1edbi Trang tr\u1ea1i Vandermark! Chúng tôi r\u1ea5t vui vì b\u1ea1n có th\u1ec3 làm vi\u1ec7c cho chúng tôi vào mùa hè này. M\u1ed7i ng\u01b0\u1eddi trong s\u1ed1 các b\u1ea1n s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ch\u1ec9 \u0111\u1ecbnh vào m\u1ed9t nhóm ch\u1ecbu trách nhi\u1ec7m làm các vi\u1ec7c khác nhau trong trang tr\u1ea1i. Gi\u1ed1ng nh\u01b0 mùa hè n\u0103m ngoái, các b\u1ea1n có th\u1ec3 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ch\u1ec9 \u0111\u1ecbnh làm ru\u1ed9ng ho\u1eb7c ch\u0103m sóc \u0111\u1ed9ng v\u1eadt. Chúng tôi có m\u1ed9t vi\u1ec7c m\u1edbi trong n\u0103m nay - m\u1ed9t xe bán \u0111\u1ed3 \u0103n. Chúng tôi s\u1ebd c\u1ea7n ng\u01b0\u1eddi qu\u1ea3n lý và bán các s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m t\u01b0\u01a1i c\u1ee7a chúng tôi quanh th\u1ecb tr\u1ea5n. M\u1eb7c dù \u0111ây là nh\u1eefng v\u1ecb trí th\u1eddi v\u1ee5 nh\u01b0ng chúng tôi luôn có c\u01a1 h\u1ed9i làm vi\u1ec7c quanh n\u0103m. N\u1ebfu b\u1ea1n quan tâm, ch\u1ec9 c\u1ea7n g\u1eedi e-mail cho Anya và cô \u1ea5y s\u1ebd cung c\u1ea5p cho b\u1ea1n danh sách t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 các v\u1ecb trí tr\u1ed1ng trong 12 tháng c\u1ee7a chúng tôi.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio: W-Br Welcome to Maple Library. (74) During tonight’s community workshop, I’ll show you how to use the library’s databases. Before we get started, (75) you’II need your library card to log on to our network. (76) Now, on the computer in front of you, enter your card number to log in. Next, I’ll show you how to enter search terms. It’s OK if you can’t remember each step. Keep in mind, I’m at the Information: desk every evening.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

W-Br: Chào m\u1eebng \u0111\u1ebfn v\u1edbi Th\u01b0 vi\u1ec7n Maple. Trong bu\u1ed5i h\u1ed9i th\u1ea3o c\u1ed9ng \u0111\u1ed3ng t\u1ed1i nay, tôi s\u1ebd h\u01b0\u1edbng d\u1eabn b\u1ea1n cách s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng c\u01a1 s\u1edf d\u1eef li\u1ec7u c\u1ee7a th\u01b0 vi\u1ec7n. Tr\u01b0\u1edbc khi chúng ta b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u, các b\u1ea1n s\u1ebd c\u1ea7n th\u1ebb th\u01b0 vi\u1ec7n c\u1ee7a mình \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111\u0103ng nh\u1eadp vào m\u1ea1ng c\u1ee7a chúng tôi. Bây gi\u1edd, trên máy tính tr\u01b0\u1edbc m\u1eb7t các b\u1ea1n, hãy nh\u1eadp s\u1ed1 th\u1ebb \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111\u0103ng nh\u1eadp. Ti\u1ebfp theo, tôi s\u1ebd h\u01b0\u1edbng d\u1eabn các b\u1ea1n cách nh\u1eadp c\u1ee5m t\u1eeb tìm ki\u1ebfm. S\u1ebd không sao n\u1ebfu các b\u1ea1n không th\u1ec3 nh\u1edb t\u1eebng b\u01b0\u1edbc. Xin l\u01b0u ý, tôi có m\u1eb7t t\u1ea1i bàn Thông tin vào m\u1ed7i bu\u1ed5i t\u1ed1i.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio: W-Am Hello. (77) I’m calling about an electric toothbrush I ordered from your company. I’m having a problem with it, and I hope you can help me. When I push the power button, the toothbrush won’t start. I don’t know why it isn’t working, because the battery is fully charged. (78) I’m leaving next week on a long trip, and I really don’t want to go away without this toothbrush. (79) Please call me back at 555-0137. Thanks.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

W-Am: Xin chào. Tôi g\u1ecdi \u0111i\u1ec7n \u0111\u1ec3 h\u1ecfi v\u1ec1 lo\u1ea1i bàn ch\u1ea3i \u0111ánh r\u0103ng \u0111i\u1ec7n mà tôi \u0111ã \u0111\u1eb7t hàng t\u1eeb công ty c\u1ee7a các b\u1ea1n. Tôi \u0111ang g\u1eb7p v\u1ea5n \u0111\u1ec1 v\u1edbi nó, mong các b\u1ea1n có th\u1ec3 giúp tôi. Khi tôi nh\u1ea5n nút ngu\u1ed3n, bàn ch\u1ea3i \u0111ánh r\u0103ng s\u1ebd không kh\u1edfi \u0111\u1ed9ng. Tôi không bi\u1ebft t\u1ea1i sao nó không ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng, vì pin \u0111ã \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c s\u1ea1c \u0111\u1ea7y. Tôi s\u1ebd có chuy\u1ebfn \u0111i ngh\u1ec9 dài ngày vào tu\u1ea7n t\u1edbi và tôi th\u1ef1c s\u1ef1 không mu\u1ed1n \u0111i xa mà không có bàn ch\u1ea3i \u0111ánh r\u0103ng này. Vui lòng g\u1ecdi l\u1ea1i cho tôi theo s\u1ed1 555-0137. C\u1ea3m \u01a1n.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio: M – Au Hi, Lucy. (80) congratulations on the real estate contract you finalized yesterday! It’s great that our clients’ properties have been selling so quickly. The advertisement we recently ran must’ve worked. (81) After placing that ad in the paper, we got lots of telephone calls from businesses looking to purchase new office spaces! The thing is … (82) while we specialize in selling office buildings in the city … you know, many companies are moving to suburban areas just outside the city. Can we talk about this after the meeting this afternoon?
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

M-Au: Chào Lucy. Xin chúc m\u1eebng h\u1ee3p \u0111\u1ed3ng b\u1ea5t \u0111\u1ed9ng s\u1ea3n mà cô \u0111ã ch\u1ed1t ngày hôm qua! Th\u1eadt tuy\u1ec7t khi tài s\u1ea3n c\u1ee7a khách hàng c\u1ee7a chúng ta \u0111ã bán r\u1ea5t nhanh. Qu\u1ea3ng cáo chúng ta ch\u1ea1y g\u1ea7n \u0111ây ch\u1eafc h\u1eb3n \u0111ã hi\u1ec7u qu\u1ea3. Sau khi \u0111\u1eb7t qu\u1ea3ng cáo \u0111ó trên báo, chúng ta \u0111ã nh\u1eadn \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c r\u1ea5t nhi\u1ec1u cu\u1ed9c \u0111i\u1ec7n tho\u1ea1i t\u1eeb các doanh nghi\u1ec7p mu\u1ed1n mua v\u0103n phòng m\u1edbi! V\u1ea5n \u0111\u1ec1 là… trong khi chúng ta chuyên bán các tòa nhà v\u0103n phòng trong thành ph\u1ed1… cô bi\u1ebft \u0111\u1ea5y, nhi\u1ec1u công ty \u0111ang chuy\u1ec3n \u0111\u1ebfn các khu v\u1ef1c ngo\u1ea1i ô ngay bên ngoài. Chúng ta có th\u1ec3 nói v\u1ec1 v\u1ea5n \u0111\u1ec1 này sau cu\u1ed9c h\u1ecdp chi\u1ec1u nay không?<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio: W-Am(83) As you all know, our restaurant’s dishwasher has been leaking water for the past couple weeks. And we’ve had to hand wash dishes and utensils to serve our customers. So, I’ve decided to upgrade- (84) a new dishwasher’s coming tomorrow. The new model works much quicker than the old one, so we’ll be able to wash dishes in half the time! One last thing,( 85) there are some extra shifts open at the end of the month. If you’d like to take any of them, please use the sign-up sheet posted on the refrigerator.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

W-Am: Nh\u01b0 các b\u1ea1n \u0111ã bi\u1ebft, máy r\u1eeda bát c\u1ee7a nhà hàng chúng ta \u0111ã b\u1ecb rò r\u1ec9 n\u01b0\u1edbc trong vài tu\u1ea7n qua. Và chúng ta \u0111ã ph\u1ea3i r\u1eeda bát \u0111\u0129a và \u0111\u1ed3 dùng b\u1eb1ng tay \u0111\u1ec3 ph\u1ee5c v\u1ee5 khách hàng. Vì v\u1eady, tôi \u0111ã quy\u1ebft \u0111\u1ecbnh nâng c\u1ea5p m\u1ed9t máy r\u1eeda bát m\u1edbi s\u1ebd \u0111\u1ebfn vào ngày mai. M\u1eabu m\u1edbi ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng nhanh h\u01a1n nhi\u1ec1u so v\u1edbi m\u1eabu c\u0169, vì v\u1eady chúng ta s\u1ebd có th\u1ec3 r\u1eeda bát \u0111\u0129a trong m\u1ed9t n\u1eeda th\u1eddi gian! M\u1ed9t \u0111i\u1ec1u cu\u1ed1i cùng, s\u1ebd có thêm m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 ca di\u1ec5n ra vào cu\u1ed1i tháng. N\u1ebfu b\u1ea1n mu\u1ed1n làm ca nào trong s\u1ed1 \u0111ó, vui lòng s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng t\u1edd \u0111\u0103ng ký \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c dán trên t\u1ee7 l\u1ea1nh.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio: Welcome to today’s Information: session about studying automotive technology at Madox Technical Institute. At Madox Technical, (86) you’ll receive the best car and truck repair training in the industry. We provide hands-on experience in real auto repair shops, which is a major advantage when applying for jobs. You can even apply by filling out the application form on your mobile phone. Before we start, (87) I see most of you have a printout of last year’s course description. The upcoming session will only last three months, not six, so you can complete the course in less time for the same price. (88) Now, let’s discuss the enrollment details you’ll need in order to register.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

Chào m\u1eebng các b\u1ea1n \u0111\u1ebfn v\u1edbi Thông tin hôm nay: bu\u1ed5i h\u1ecdc v\u1ec1 công ngh\u1ec7 ô tô t\u1ea1i H\u1ecdc vi\u1ec7n K\u1ef9 thu\u1eadt Madox. T\u1ea1i H\u1ecdc vi\u1ec7n K\u1ef9 thu\u1eadt Madox, b\u1ea1n s\u1ebd nh\u1eadn \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c khóa \u0111ào t\u1ea1o s\u1eeda ch\u1eefa ô tô và xe t\u1ea3i t\u1ed1t nh\u1ea5t trong ngành. Chúng tôi cung c\u1ea5p kinh nghi\u1ec7m th\u1ef1c t\u1ebf trong các c\u1eeda hàng s\u1eeda ch\u1eefa ô tô, \u0111ây là m\u1ed9t l\u1ee3i th\u1ebf l\u1edbn khi xin vi\u1ec7c. Các b\u1ea1n th\u1eadm chí có th\u1ec3 \u0111\u0103ng ký b\u1eb1ng cách \u0111i\u1ec1n vào m\u1eabu \u0111\u01a1n \u0111\u0103ng ký trên \u0111i\u1ec7n tho\u1ea1i di \u0111\u1ed9ng c\u1ee7a mình. Tr\u01b0\u1edbc khi chúng ta b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u, tôi th\u1ea5y h\u1ea7u h\u1ebft các b\u1ea1n \u0111\u1ec1u có b\u1ea3n in mô t\u1ea3 khóa h\u1ecdc n\u0103m ngoái. Khóa h\u1ecdc s\u1eafp t\u1edbi s\u1ebd ch\u1ec9 kéo dài ba tháng, không ph\u1ea3i sáu tháng, vì v\u1eady các b\u1ea1n có th\u1ec3 hoàn thành khóa h\u1ecdc trong th\u1eddi gian ng\u1eafn h\u01a1n v\u1edbi cùng m\u1ed9t m\u1ee9c giá. Bây gi\u1edd, hãy th\u1ea3o lu\u1eadn chi ti\u1ebft b\u1ea1n c\u1ea7n \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111\u0103ng ký.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio: OK, everyone.(89) Thank you for coming to today’s workshop. It’s eight o’clock and we have a lot of material to cover today. I’m Sanjay, the executive director of Human Resources, and (90) today we’ll be talking about selecting job applicants. As managers, it can be quite overwhelming for us to go through a large number of job applications to figure out who to interview. So to start off, (91) I’d like you to turn to the person sitting next to you and take about five minutes to list both positive and negative aspects of a resume and cover letter-what stands  out to you as a potential candidate to contact.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

\u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c r\u1ed3i, m\u1ecdi ng\u01b0\u1eddi. C\u1ea3m \u01a1n các b\u1ea1n \u0111ã \u0111\u1ebfn v\u1edbi bu\u1ed5i h\u1ed9i th\u1ea3o c\u1ee7a ngày hôm nay. Bây gi\u1edd là 8 gi\u1edd và chúng tôi có r\u1ea5t nhi\u1ec1u tài li\u1ec7u \u0111\u1ec3 xem ngày hôm nay. Tôi là Sanjay, Giám \u0111\u1ed1c \u0110i\u1ec1u hành B\u1ed9 ph\u1eadn Nhân s\u1ef1, và hôm nay chúng ta s\u1ebd nói v\u1ec1 vi\u1ec7c l\u1ef1a ch\u1ecdn các \u1ee9ng viên xin vi\u1ec7c. Là nh\u1eefng nhà qu\u1ea3n lý, chúng ta có th\u1ec3 khá choáng ng\u1ee3p khi ph\u1ea3i xem qua m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 l\u01b0\u1ee3ng l\u1edbn các \u0111\u01a1n xin vi\u1ec7c \u0111\u1ec3 tìm ra \u1ee9ng viên. Vì v\u1eady, \u0111\u1ec3 b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u, tôi mu\u1ed1n các b\u1ea1n quay sang ng\u01b0\u1eddi ng\u1ed3i bên c\u1ea1nh và dành kho\u1ea3ng n\u0103m phút \u0111\u1ec3 li\u1ec7t kê c\u1ea3 nh\u1eefng khía c\u1ea1nh tích c\u1ef1c và tiêu c\u1ef1c trong s\u01a1 y\u1ebfu lý l\u1ecbch và th\u01b0 xin vi\u1ec7c - \u0111i\u1ec1u gì n\u1ed5i b\u1eadt \u0111\u1ed1i v\u1edbi b\u1ea1n khi liên h\u1ec7 v\u1edbi m\u1ed9t \u1ee9ng viên ti\u1ec1m n\u0103ng.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio: Hello, Ms. Morris, (92) I’m calling about the estimate you requested. It looks like the renovations you want me to do for your kitchen will cost at least 10,000 dollars. (93) I know that’s a little more than you were planning to spend. Now- (94)one way we could cut down on the  immediate cost is to break the renovation up into different stages. It’ll take longer but it’ll cost less up front, and you can decide after each stage if you want to continue. Either way, call me back and let me know what you think.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

Chào cô Morris, tôi g\u1ecdi \u0111i\u1ec7n \u0111\u1ec3 nói v\u1ec1 \u01b0\u1edbc tính mà cô yêu c\u1ea7u. Có v\u1ebb nh\u01b0 vi\u1ec7c tân trang l\u1ea1i cô mu\u1ed1n tôi làm cho nhà b\u1ebfp s\u1ebd t\u1ed1n ít nh\u1ea5t 10.000 \u0111ô la. Tôi bi\u1ebft s\u1ed1 ti\u1ec1n \u0111ó nhi\u1ec1u h\u01a1n m\u1ed9t chút so v\u1edbi s\u1ed1 ti\u1ec1n cô \u0111\u1ecbnh chi. Bây gi\u1edd có m\u1ed9t cách mà chúng ta có th\u1ec3 c\u1eaft gi\u1ea3m chi phí tr\u01b0\u1edbc m\u1eaft là chia nh\u1ecf vi\u1ec7c c\u1ea3i t\u1ea1o thành các giai \u0111o\u1ea1n khác nhau. S\u1ebd m\u1ea5t nhi\u1ec1u th\u1eddi gian h\u01a1n nh\u01b0ng s\u1ebd ít t\u1ed1n kém h\u01a1n khi tr\u1ea3 tr\u01b0\u1edbc và cô có th\u1ec3 quy\u1ebft \u0111\u1ecbnh sau m\u1ed7i giai \u0111o\u1ea1n n\u1ebfu cô mu\u1ed1n ti\u1ebfp t\u1ee5c. Dù l\u1ef1a ch\u1ecdn ph\u01b0\u01a1ng án nào, hãy g\u1ecdi l\u1ea1i cho tôi và cho tôi bi\u1ebft quy\u1ebft \u0111\u1ecbnh c\u1ee7a cô.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio: (95) Thank you for calling Abrams Health Center. Our office is open Monday through Friday, eight A.M. to five P.M. If you’d like to make an appointment with one of our doctors, or if you’d like to reschedule an appointment, please stay on the line. (96) If you have a question about billing or payments, please dial extension 35 to speak to our billing specialist. Lastly, we are reminding all patients that we’ve recently updated our cancellation policy. (97) For details on our new policy, visit http://www.abramshealthcenter.com. Have a good day!
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

C\u1ea3m \u01a1n b\u1ea1n \u0111ã g\u1ecdi \u0111\u1ebfn Trung tâm Y t\u1ebf Abrams. V\u0103n phòng c\u1ee7a chúng tôi m\u1edf c\u1eeda t\u1eeb th\u1ee9 Hai \u0111\u1ebfn th\u1ee9 Sáu, tám gi\u1edd sáng \u0111\u1ebfn n\u0103m gi\u1edd chi\u1ec1u N\u1ebfu b\u1ea1n mu\u1ed1n \u0111\u1eb7t l\u1ecbch h\u1eb9n v\u1edbi m\u1ed9t trong các bác s\u0129 c\u1ee7a chúng tôi ho\u1eb7c n\u1ebfu b\u1ea1n mu\u1ed1n lên l\u1ecbch l\u1ea1i cu\u1ed9c h\u1eb9n, vui lòng gi\u1eef máy. N\u1ebfu b\u1ea1n có câu h\u1ecfi v\u1ec1 vi\u1ec7c l\u1eadp hóa \u0111\u01a1n ho\u1eb7c thanh toán, vui lòng quay s\u1ed1 máy l\u1ebb 35 \u0111\u1ec3 nói chuy\u1ec7n v\u1edbi chuyên gia thanh toán c\u1ee7a chúng tôi. Cu\u1ed1i cùng, chúng tôi nh\u1eafc v\u1edbi t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 b\u1ec7nh nhân r\u1eb1ng g\u1ea7n \u0111ây chúng tôi \u0111ã c\u1eadp nh\u1eadt chính sách h\u1ee7y l\u1ecbch. \u0110\u1ec3 bi\u1ebft chi ti\u1ebft v\u1ec1 chính sách m\u1edbi c\u1ee7a chúng tôi, hãy truy c\u1eadp http:\/\/www.abramshealthcenter.com. Chúc b\u1ea1n ngày m\u1edbi t\u1ed1t lành!<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio: OK, so let’s start our board of directors’ meeting. Based on our company-wide survey,(98) employees disliked our initial proposal of building another office building on our campus. They thought the walk to the new building would be too far for meetings. So, instead, we’re planning on adding a new wing to an existing building. Here’s our current site map. (99) The architect recommends that we connect the new wing to the hall on the north side of the map, next to the pond. The new wing will have a patio area near the pond for employees to eat lunch.(100) I’d like to go over the budget for this project-it’s less expensive than the previous plan.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

\u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c r\u1ed3i, chúng ta hãy b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u cu\u1ed9c h\u1ecdp ban giám \u0111\u1ed1c. D\u1ef1a trên cu\u1ed9c kh\u1ea3o sát toàn công ty, nhân viên không thích \u0111\u1ec1 xu\u1ea5t ban \u0111\u1ea7u c\u1ee7a chúng ta v\u1ec1 vi\u1ec7c xây d\u1ef1ng m\u1ed9t tòa nhà v\u0103n phòng khác trong khuôn viên. H\u1ecd ngh\u0129 r\u1eb1ng vi\u1ec7c \u0111i b\u1ed9 \u0111\u1ebfn h\u1ecdp \u1edf tòa nhà m\u1edbi quá xa. Vì v\u1eady, thay vào \u0111ó, chúng ta \u0111ang lên k\u1ebf ho\u1ea1ch thêm m\u1ed9t cánh m\u1edbi \u1edf m\u1ed9t tòa nhà hi\u1ec7n có. \u0110ây là s\u01a1 \u0111\u1ed3 khuôn viên hi\u1ec7n t\u1ea1i c\u1ee7a chúng ta. Ki\u1ebfn trúc s\u01b0 khuy\u1ebfn ngh\u1ecb chúng ta k\u1ebft n\u1ed1i cánh m\u1edbi v\u1edbi \u0111\u1ea1i s\u1ea3nh \u1edf phía b\u1eafc c\u1ee7a b\u1ea3n \u0111\u1ed3, bên c\u1ea1nh cái ao. Cánh m\u1edbi s\u1ebd có khu v\u1ef1c sân g\u1ea7n ao \u0111\u1ec3 nhân viên dùng b\u1eefa tr\u01b0a. Tôi mu\u1ed1n th\u1ea3o lu\u1eadn v\u1ec1 ngân sách cho d\u1ef1 án này - nó ít t\u1ed1n kém h\u01a1n so v\u1edbi k\u1ebf ho\u1ea1ch tr\u01b0\u1edbc \u0111ó.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Why did employees dislike a proposal?
childrens.answers: ["Construction noise would be disruptive.","A parking fee would increase.","A location would be inconvenient.","Outdoor seating space would be limited."]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

T\u1ea1i sao các nhân viên không thích m\u1ed9t \u0111\u1ec1 xu\u1ea5t?<\/p>

A. Ti\u1ebfng \u1ed3n xây d\u1ef1ng s\u1ebd làm phi\u1ec1n.<\/p>

B. Phí \u0111\u1eadu xe s\u1ebd t\u0103ng.<\/p>

C. M\u1ed9t v\u1ecb trí s\u1ebd không thu\u1eadn ti\u1ec7n.<\/p>

D. Không gian ch\u1ed7 ng\u1ed3i ngoài tr\u1eddi s\u1ebd b\u1ecb h\u1ea1n ch\u1ebf.<\/p>###

Thông tin:<\/p>

Deangelo's Delights n\u1ed5i ti\u1ebfng \u0111\u1ebfn m\u1ee9c ng\u01b0\u1eddi ch\u1ee7 \u0111ã m\u1edf thêm hai ti\u1ec7m bánh.<\/p>

A. allowable: \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c phép<\/p>

B. additional: thêm<\/p>

C. uninterested: không thích<\/p>

D. inclusive: k\u1ec3 c\u1ea3<\/p>","en":"

Deangelo's Delights was so popular that the owner opened two additional bakeries.<\/p>###

A. allowable: that is allowed, especially by law or by a set of rules<\/p>

B. additional: more than was first mentioned or is usual<\/p>

C. uninterested: not interested<\/p>

D. inclusive: having the total cost<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Chef Octavia Farina took over Fratelli’s Restaurant —— the previous chef left to open a new restaurant.
childrens.answers: ["unless","rather than","as if","after"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Chef Octavia Farina took over Fratelli’s Restaurant after the previous chef left to open a new restaurant.<\/p>###

\u0110\u1ea7u b\u1ebfp Octavia Farina ti\u1ebfp nh\u1eadn Nhà hàng Fratelli sau khi \u0111\u1ea7u b\u1ebfp tr\u01b0\u1edbc r\u1eddi \u0111i \u0111\u1ec3 m\u1edf m\u1ed9t nhà hàng m\u1edbi.<\/p>

A. unless: tr\u1eeb phi<\/p>

B. rather than: thay vì<\/p>

C. as if: nh\u01b0 th\u1ec3<\/p>

D. after: sau khi<\/p>","en":"

Chef Octavia Farina took over Fratelli’s Restaurant after the previous chef left to open a new restaurant.<\/p>###

A. unless:  used to say that something can only happen or be true in a particular situation<\/p>

B. rather than: instead of somebody\/something<\/p>

C. as if: in a way that suggests something<\/p>

D. after: later than something<\/p>"}

childrens.title: The director of Wingstom Foods commended Ms. Weiss for increasing——in the bakery division.
childrens.answers: ["produced","producing","production","productive"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

The director of Wingstom Foods commended Ms. Weiss for increasing production in the bakery division.<\/p>###

Giám \u0111\u1ed1c c\u1ee7a Hãng th\u1ef1c ph\u1ea9m Wingstom \u0111ã khen ng\u1ee3i cô Weiss vì \u0111ã t\u0103ng s\u1ea3n l\u01b0\u1ee3ng c\u1ee7a b\u1ed9 ph\u1eadn làm bánh.<\/p>

A. produced (v-ed)<\/p>

B. producing (v-ing)<\/p>

C. production (n.)<\/p>

D. productive (adj.)<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

Tr\u01b0\u1edbc ch\u1ed7 tr\u1ed1ng c\u1ea7n \u0111i\u1ec1n là tính t\u1eeb increasing nên ta c\u1ea7n m\u1ed9t tính t\u1eeb.<\/p>","en":"

The director of Wingstom Foods commended Ms. Weiss for increasing production in the bakery division.<\/p>###

A. produced (v-ed)<\/p>

B. producing (v-ing)<\/p>

C. production (n.)<\/p>

D. productive (adj.)<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

The blank is right after the adjective increasing so we use a noun.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Greg Owens, founder of multi – national Hermes Taxi Service, used to drive a taxi— .
childrens.answers: ["he","his","himself","his own"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Greg Owens, founder of multi-national Hermes Taxi Service, used to drive a taxi himself.<\/p>###

Greg Owens, ng\u01b0\u1eddi sáng l\u1eadp D\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 Taxi Hermes \u0111a qu\u1ed1c gia, t\u1eebng t\u1ef1 lái taxi.<\/p>

A. he (pron.): anh \u1ea5y - \u0111óng vai trò ch\u1ee7 ng\u1eef<\/p>

B. his (adj.): c\u1ee7a anh \u1ea5y - \u0111\u1ee9ng tr\u01b0\u1edbc danh t\u1eeb<\/p>

C. himself (reflexive pron.): t\u1ef1 anh \u1ea5y - \u0111\u1ee9ng cu\u1ed1i câu \u0111\u1ec3 nh\u1ea5n m\u1ea1nh<\/p>

D. his own (possessive adj.): c\u1ee7a chính anh \u1ea5y<\/p>","en":"

Greg Owens, founder of multi-national Hermes Taxi Service, used to drive a taxi himself.<\/p>###

A. he (pron.) - acting as a subject<\/p>

B. his (adj.) - sits before a noun<\/p>

C. himself (reflexive pron.) - sits at the end of the sentence.<\/p>

D. his own (possessive adj.)<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Starlight Theaters is proud to announce record earnings for the third quarter, far exceeding —–.
childrens.answers: ["adjustments","endorsements","computations","expectations"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Starlight Theaters is proud to announce record earnings for the third quarter, far exceeding expectations.<\/p>###

Chu\u1ed7i r\u1ea1p hát Starlight t\u1ef1 hào thông báo doanh thu k\u1ef7 l\u1ee5c trong quý th\u1ee9 ba, v\u01b0\u1ee3t xa k\u1ef3 v\u1ecdng.<\/p>

A. adjustments: s\u1ef1 ch\u1ec9nh lý<\/p>

B. endorsements: s\u1ef1 tán thành<\/p>

C. computations: s\u1ef1 tính toán<\/p>

D. expectations: s\u1ef1 k\u1ef3 v\u1ecdng<\/p>","en":"

Starlight Theaters is proud to announce record earnings for the third quarter, far exceeding expectations.<\/p>###

A. adjustments: small changes made to something in order to correct or improve it<\/p>

B. endorsements: public statements or actions showing that you support somebody\/something<\/p>

C. computations: acts or the processes of calculating something<\/p>

D. expectations:  beliefs that something will happen because it is likely<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Employees can attend one of the many workshops offered, —- seem s most interesting.
childrens.answers: ["whichever","however","everyone","much"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Employees can attend one of the many workshops offered, whichever seems most interesting.<\/p>###

Nhân viên có th\u1ec3 tham d\u1ef1 m\u1ed9t trong nhi\u1ec1u h\u1ed9i th\u1ea3o \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c cung c\u1ea5p, b\u1ea5t k\u1ef3 h\u1ed9i th\u1ea3o nào có v\u1ebb thú v\u1ecb nh\u1ea5t.<\/p>

A. whichever (+ V ): b\u1ea5t c\u1ee9 ... nào<\/p>

B. however (+ adj.\/ adv. + S + be\/V): dù nh\u01b0 th\u1ebf nào<\/p>

C. everyone: m\u1ecdi ng\u01b0\u1eddi<\/p>

D. much: nhi\u1ec1u <\/p>","en":"

Employees can attend one of the many workshops offered, whichever seems most interesting.<\/p>###

A. whichever (+ V ): used to say that it does not matter which, as the result will be the same<\/p>

B. however (+ adj.\/ adv. + S + be\/V): used with an adjective or adverb to mean ‘to whatever degree’<\/p>

C. everyone: all people<\/p>

D. much: a large amount of something<\/p>"}

childrens.title: —- her strong negotiation skills, Marie Russel was made Sanwa, Inc.’s lead sales contact.
childrens.answers: ["Given","Deciding","Finding","Because"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Given her strong negotiation skills, Marie Russel was made Sanwa, lnc.'s lead sales contact.<\/p>###

V\u1edbi k\u1ef9 n\u0103ng \u0111àm phán m\u1ea1nh m\u1ebd c\u1ee7a mình, Marie Russel \u0111ã \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ch\u1ecdn làm \u0111\u1ea7u m\u1ed1i bán hàng c\u1ee7a Sanwa lnc.<\/p>

A. Given (past participle): V\u1edbi<\/p>

B. Deciding (v-ing): Quy\u1ebft \u0111\u1ecbnh<\/p>

C. Finding (v-ing): Tìm th\u1ea5y<\/p>

D. Because + clause: B\u1edfi vì<\/p>","en":"

Given her strong negotiation skills, Marie Russel was made Sanwa, lnc.'s lead sales contact.<\/p>###

A. Given (past participle) = provided<\/p>

B. Deciding (v-ing): thinking carefully about the different possibilities that are available and choose one of them<\/p>

C. Finding (v-ing): discovering somebody\/something by chance<\/p>

D. Because + clause: for the reason that<\/p>"}

childrens.title: A locked suggestion box will allow employees to submit feedback to management ——– .
childrens.answers: ["anonymously","approximately","expressly","patiently"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

A locked suggestion box will allow employees to submit feedback to management anonymously.<\/p>###

H\u1ed9p th\u01b0 góp ý b\u1ecb khóa s\u1ebd cho phép nhân viên g\u1eedi ph\u1ea3n h\u1ed3i \u1ea9n danh cho ban qu\u1ea3n lý.<\/p>

A. anonymously: \u1ea9n danh<\/p>

B. approximately: kho\u1ea3ng<\/p>

C. expressly: rõ ràng<\/p>

D. patiently: nh\u1eabn n\u1ea1i<\/p>","en":"

A locked suggestion box will allow employees to submit feedback to management anonymously.<\/p>###

A. anonymously: by somebody who does not want their name to be known or made public<\/p>

B. approximately: almost<\/p>

C. expressly: clearly<\/p>

D. patiently: in a way that shows that you are able to wait for a long time or to accept annoying behaviour or difficulties without becoming angry<\/p>"}

childrens.title: A new strategy is under development to —- our products more aggressively overseas.
childrens.answers: ["invest","compete","participate","market"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

A new strategy is under development to market our products more aggressively overseas.<\/p>###

M\u1ed9t chi\u1ebfn l\u01b0\u1ee3c m\u1edbi \u0111ang \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c phát tri\u1ec3n \u0111\u1ec3 ti\u1ebfp th\u1ecb s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m c\u1ee7a chúng tôi m\u1ea1nh m\u1ebd h\u01a1n \u1edf n\u01b0\u1edbc ngoài.<\/p>

A. invest: \u0111\u1ea7u t\u01b0<\/p>

B. compete: c\u1ea1nh tranh<\/p>

C. participate: tham gia<\/p>

D. market: ti\u1ebfp th\u1ecb<\/p>","en":"

A new strategy is under development to market our products more aggressively overseas.<\/p>###

A. invest: buy property, shares in a company, etc. in the hope of making a profit<\/p>

B. compete: take part in a contest or game<\/p>

C. participate: take part in or become involved in an activity<\/p>

D. market: advertise a product in a particular way in order to make people want it<\/p>"}

childrens.title: —- on the city’s ongoing revitalization project, Mayor Owen promised that residents would be pleased with the results.
childrens.answers: ["Comment","Comments","Commented","Commenting"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Commenting on the city’s ongoing revitalization project, Mayor Owen promised that residents would be pleased with the results.<\/p>###

Nh\u1eadn xét v\u1ec1 d\u1ef1 án khôi ph\u1ee5c \u0111ang di\u1ec5n ra c\u1ee7a thành ph\u1ed1, Th\u1ecb tr\u01b0\u1edfng Owen h\u1ee9a r\u1eb1ng c\u01b0 dân s\u1ebd hài lòng v\u1edbi k\u1ebft qu\u1ea3 \u0111\u1ea1t \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c.<\/p>

A. Comment (n., v.)<\/p>

B. Comments (pl. n., v-s)<\/p>

C. Commented (v-ed)<\/p>

D. Commenting (v-ing)<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

C\u1ea3 hai m\u1ec7nh \u0111\u1ec1 có cùng ch\u1ee7 ng\u1eef Mayor Owen nên \u1edf m\u1ec7nh \u0111\u1ec1 \u0111\u1ea7u tiên, ch\u1ee7 ng\u1eef b\u1ecb rút g\u1ecdn và \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb chia \u1edf d\u1ea1ng \u0111uôi -ing.<\/p>","en":"

Commenting on the city’s ongoing revitalization project, Mayor Owen promised that residents would be pleased with the results.<\/p>###

A. Comment (n., v.)<\/p>

B. Comments (pl. n., v-s)<\/p>

C. Commented (v-ed)<\/p>

D. Commenting (v-ing)<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

Both of clauses have the same subject Mayor Owen so in the first clause, the subject can be dimissed and we use the verb-ing form.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: ——– , repairs to the plumbing pipes in the Moffett Building will be costly.

childrens.title: The CEO’s speech will be recorded in its —- and made available to employees who could not attend the meeting.

Bài phát bi\u1ec3u c\u1ee7a Giám \u0111\u1ed1c \u0111i\u1ec1u hành s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ghi l\u1ea1i toàn b\u1ed9 và cung c\u1ea5p cho nh\u1eefng nhân viên không th\u1ec3 tham d\u1ef1 cu\u1ed9c h\u1ecdp.<\/p>

A. entirety: toàn b\u1ed9<\/p>

B. system: h\u1ec7 th\u1ed1ng<\/p>

childrens.title: Trails on the southeast side of the mountain are often closed —- because storms tend to occur without warning.

A. accidentally:  in a way that was not planned<\/p>

B. coincidentally: in a way that is not planned<\/p>

C. steeply: not gradually<\/p>

D. unexpectedly: in a way that surprises you because you were not expecting it<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Please submit your hours —- any work-related expense reports by Friday.

Vui lòng g\u1eedi gi\u1edd làm vi\u1ec7c c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n c\u0169ng nh\u01b0 b\u1ea5t k\u1ef3 báo cáo chi phí liên quan \u0111\u1ebfn công vi\u1ec7c tr\u01b0\u1edbc th\u1ee9 Sáu.<\/p>

A. as well as: in addition to somebody\/something<\/p>

C. in addition (to sb\/sth): used when you want to mention another person or thing after something else<\/p>

D. in case that: if that is the situation<\/p>"}

parts.name: Text completion
parts.title: Read the texts that follow. A word or pharse is missing in some of the sentences. Four answer choices are given below each of the sentences. Select the best answer to complete the text. Then mark the letter (A), (B), (C) or (D) on your answer sheet.

questions.text_read:
On Friday, April 14, the city hall’s electricity is scheduled to be shut down at 7 A.M. and restored at 6 P.M. The building ---1--- for the day. During the power outage, the emergency lighting system will be upgraded. ---2---, all circuit panels will be replaced to bring them into compliance with current safety codes.

---3--- exiting city hall offices on Thursday, please disconnect all desktop computers, wireless servers, and other computer-related equipment. Furthermore, employees are asked to remove any personal contents from the kitchenette. ---4---. Please direct questions or concerns to the director of building maintenance.
questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

Vào th\u1ee9 Sáu, ngày 14 tháng 4, tòa th\u1ecb chính thành ph\u1ed1 d\u1ef1 ki\u1ebfn c\u1eaft \u0111i\u1ec7n lúc 7 gi\u1edd sáng và có l\u1ea1i lúc 6 gi\u1edd chi\u1ec1u. Tòa nhà s\u1ebd \u0111óng c\u1eeda c\u1ea3 ngày. Trong th\u1eddi gian m\u1ea5t \u0111i\u1ec7n, h\u1ec7 th\u1ed1ng \u0111èn chi\u1ebfu sáng kh\u1ea9n c\u1ea5p s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c nâng c\u1ea5p. C\u1ee5 th\u1ec3, t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 các b\u1ea3ng m\u1ea1ch s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c thay th\u1ebf \u0111\u1ec3 tuân th\u1ee7 các quy t\u1eafc an toàn hi\u1ec7n hành.<\/p>

Tr\u01b0\u1edbc khi r\u1eddi kh\u1ecfi v\u0103n phòng tòa th\u1ecb chính vào th\u1ee9 N\u0103m, vui lòng ng\u1eaft k\u1ebft n\u1ed1i t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 các máy tính \u0111\u1ec3 bàn, máy ch\u1ee7 không dây và các thi\u1ebft b\u1ecb liên quan \u0111\u1ebfn máy tính khác. H\u01a1n n\u1eefa, nhân viên \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c yêu c\u1ea7u không \u0111\u1ec3 b\u1ea5t k\u1ef3 v\u1eadt d\u1ee5ng cá nhân nào trên b\u1ebfp nh\u1ecf. B\u1ea5t k\u1ef3 \u0111\u1ed3 nào \u0111\u1ec3 l\u1ea1i s\u1ebd b\u1ecb b\u1ecf \u0111i. Vui lòng g\u1eedi câu h\u1ecfi ho\u1eb7c th\u1eafc m\u1eafc tr\u1ef1c ti\u1ebfp \u0111\u1ebfn giám \u0111\u1ed1c b\u1ea3o trì tòa nhà.<\/p>"}

questions.text_read:
To: Annette Schreiber
<[email protected]>
From: Herbert Peraino, General Manager
<[email protected]>
Date: May 5
Subject: Private Party
Hello Ms. Schreiber,
Thank you for considering Partyon for your upcoming event. We welcome the opportunity to inform you about the areas we have available.

---1---. Our patio, for instance, can hold up to 15 people. This space is ---2--- for small get-togethers. Our lounge area can fit up to 40 people. It is best suited for informal ---3---. Then there’s our grand dining room, intended for more formal parties. It offers accommodations for up to 60 guests. Moreover, we can ---4--- design either a lunch or dinner menu for you according to your specifications.

If you have any further questions, please do not
hesitate to contact us.


Sincerely,


Herbert Peraino

\u0110\u1ebfn: Annette Schreiber<\/p>

T\u1eeb: Herbert Peraino, T\u1ed5ng giám \u0111\u1ed1c<\/p>

Ngày: 5 tháng 5<\/p>

Ch\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ec1: B\u1eefa ti\u1ec7c riêng t\u01b0<\/p>

Chào cô Schreiber,<\/p>

C\u1ea3m \u01a1n cô \u0111ã cân nh\u1eafc Partyon cho s\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n s\u1eafp t\u1edbi c\u1ee7a mình. Chúng tôi hoan nghênh c\u01a1 h\u1ed9i \u0111\u1ec3 thông báo cho cô v\u1ec1 các khu v\u1ef1c mà chúng tôi có.<\/p>

Chúng tôi cung c\u1ea5p các lo\u1ea1i phòng khác nhau tùy thu\u1ed9c vào quy mô b\u1eefa ti\u1ec7c c\u1ee7a cô. Sân c\u1ee7a chúng tôi, ch\u1eb3ng h\u1ea1n, có th\u1ec3 ch\u1ee9a t\u1edbi 15 ng\u01b0\u1eddi. Không gian này lý t\u01b0\u1edfng cho nh\u1eefng bu\u1ed5i g\u1eb7p g\u1ee1 nh\u1ecf. Khu v\u1ef1c ti\u1ebfp khách c\u1ee7a chúng tôi có th\u1ec3 ch\u1ee9a \u0111\u1ebfn 40 ng\u01b0\u1eddi. Nó phù h\u1ee3p nh\u1ea5t cho nh\u1eefng bu\u1ed5i h\u1ecdp m\u1eb7t thân m\u1eadt. Ti\u1ebfp \u0111ó là phòng \u0103n l\u1edbn c\u1ee7a chúng tôi, dành cho nh\u1eefng b\u1eefa ti\u1ec7c trang tr\u1ecdng h\u01a1n. N\u01a1i \u0111ây ch\u1ee9a t\u1ed1i \u0111a 60 khách. H\u01a1n n\u1eefa, chúng tôi có th\u1ec3 d\u1ec5 dàng thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf th\u1ef1c \u0111\u01a1n b\u1eefa tr\u01b0a ho\u1eb7c b\u1eefa t\u1ed1i cho cô theo yêu c\u1ea7u.<\/p>

N\u1ebfu cô có b\u1ea5t k\u1ef3 câu h\u1ecfi nào khác, xin vui lòng liên h\u1ec7 v\u1edbi chúng tôi.<\/p>

Trân tr\u1ecdng,<\/p>

Herbert Peraino<\/p>"}

questions.text_read:
TAYLORSVILLE (October 4) – Mayor Bo Crandell of the town of Taylorsville announced plans for a bicycle-share program this week. Past efforts to encourage the use of bicycles for transportation failed because there were no
convenient areas to park bicycles downtown. Additionally, cyclists ---1--- to share narrow streets with cars and trucks, raising safety concerns.

With the new bicycle-share initiative, bicycle stations will be placed ---2--- at eight locations
around Taylorsville. One important purpose of the initiative is to ease the limited vehicle parking in the downtown area. “---3---, I want to encourage local residents to spend more time outdoors and enjoy our beautiful town,” added the mayor at the end of his remarks. ---4---.
questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

TAYLORSVILLE (4 tháng 10) —Mayor Bo Crandell c\u1ee7a th\u1ecb tr\u1ea5n Taylorsville \u0111ã công b\u1ed1 k\u1ebf ho\u1ea1ch cho m\u1ed9t ch\u01b0\u01a1ng trình chia s\u1ebb xe \u0111\u1ea1p trong tu\u1ea7n này. Nh\u1eefng n\u1ed7 l\u1ef1c tr\u01b0\u1edbc \u0111ây nh\u1eb1m khuy\u1ebfn khích s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng xe \u0111\u1ea1p \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111i l\u1ea1i \u0111ã th\u1ea5t b\u1ea1i vì không có khu v\u1ef1c thu\u1eadn ti\u1ec7n \u0111\u1ec3 gi\u1eef xe \u0111\u1ea1p \u1edf trung tâm thành ph\u1ed1. Ngoài ra, nh\u1eefng ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111i xe \u0111\u1ea1p bu\u1ed9c ph\u1ea3i \u0111i chung \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng h\u1eb9p v\u1edbi ô tô và xe t\u1ea3i, gây lo ng\u1ea1i v\u1ec1 an toàn.<\/p>

V\u1edbi sáng ki\u1ebfn chia s\u1ebb xe \u0111\u1ea1p m\u1edbi, các tr\u1ea1m xe \u0111\u1ea1p s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111\u1eb7t m\u1ed9t cách chi\u1ebfn l\u01b0\u1ee3c t\u1ea1i tám \u0111\u1ecba \u0111i\u1ec3m xung quanh Taylorsville. M\u1ed9t m\u1ee5c \u0111ích quan tr\u1ecdng c\u1ee7a sáng ki\u1ebfn này là gi\u1ea3m b\u1edbt tình tr\u1ea1ng h\u1ea1n ch\u1ebf \u0111\u1eadu xe trong khu v\u1ef1c trung tâm thành ph\u1ed1. “H\u01a1n n\u1eefa, tôi mu\u1ed1n khuy\u1ebfn khích c\u01b0 dân \u0111\u1ecba ph\u01b0\u01a1ng dành nhi\u1ec1u th\u1eddi gian h\u01a1n \u1edf ngoài tr\u1eddi và t\u1eadn h\u01b0\u1edfng thành ph\u1ed1 xinh \u0111\u1eb9p c\u1ee7a chúng ta,” th\u1ecb tr\u01b0\u1edfng nói thêm vào cu\u1ed1i bài phát bi\u1ec3u c\u1ee7a mình. Ông \u0111\u1eb7t m\u1ee5c tiêu s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0a các tr\u1ea1m xe \u0111\u1ea1p vào s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng s\u1edbm nh\u1ea5t là vào tháng 4 t\u1edbi.<\/p>"}

questions.text_read:
To: All employees
From: Alex Muresianu
Date: 28 June
Subject: New employee handbook training

Klok Financial has recently updated its employee handbook. ---1---. Although the Information: concerning benefits and terms of employment remains the same, other important modifications
have been made. This version of the handbook includes new policies concerning e-mail privacy, Internet use, and use of mobile devices. Our travel guidelines have also been ---2---. The process for reimbursement after a trip is now much more efficient.
All employees must attend an Information:al session about the policies. One-hour sessions will be held at 10 A.M. on 9 July and 16 July. ---3---, employees will be required to sign a form acknowledging that they have received, read, and
understood the Information: contained in the handbook and that they accept the terms. Please arrange with your manager ---4--- one of these sessions.

Alex Muresianu
questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

\u0110\u1ebfn: T\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 nhân viên<\/p>

T\u1edbi: Alex Muresianu<\/p>

Ngày: 28 tháng 6<\/p>

Ch\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ec1: C\u1ea9m nang \u0111ào t\u1ea1o nhân viên m\u1edbi<\/p>

Công ty tài chính Klok g\u1ea7n \u0111ây \u0111ã c\u1eadp nh\u1eadt s\u1ed5 tay nhân viên. \u0110ây là thay \u0111\u1ed5i \u0111\u1ea7u tiên trong h\u01a1n m\u01b0\u1eddi n\u0103m. M\u1eb7c dù thông tin liên quan \u0111\u1ebfn quy\u1ec1n l\u1ee3i và \u0111i\u1ec1u ki\u1ec7n tuy\u1ec3n d\u1ee5ng v\u1eabn gi\u1eef nguyên, nh\u01b0ng các s\u1eeda \u0111\u1ed5i quan tr\u1ecdng khác \u0111ã \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c th\u1ef1c hi\u1ec7n. Phiên b\u1ea3n này c\u1ee7a s\u1ed5 tay bao g\u1ed3m các chính sách m\u1edbi liên quan \u0111\u1ebfn quy\u1ec1n riêng t\u01b0 c\u1ee7a e-mail, s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng Internet và s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng thi\u1ebft b\u1ecb di \u0111\u1ed9ng. H\u01b0\u1edbng d\u1eabn du l\u1ecbch c\u1ee7a chúng ta c\u0169ng \u0111ã \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c s\u1eeda \u0111\u1ed5i. Quy trình hoàn tr\u1ea3 sau chuy\u1ebfn \u0111i gi\u1edd \u0111ây hi\u1ec7u qu\u1ea3 h\u01a1n nhi\u1ec1u.<\/p>

T\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 nhân viên ph\u1ea3i tham gia m\u1ed9t bu\u1ed5i thông tin v\u1ec1 các chính sách. Các bu\u1ed5i kéo dài m\u1ed9t gi\u1edd s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c t\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c lúc 10 gi\u1edd sáng vào ngày 9 tháng 7 và ngày 16 tháng 7. Ngay sau \u0111ó, nhân viên s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c yêu c\u1ea7u ký vào m\u1ed9t bi\u1ec3u m\u1eabu xác nh\u1eadn r\u1eb1ng h\u1ecd \u0111ã nh\u1eadn, \u0111\u1ecdc và hi\u1ec3u thông tin có trong s\u1ed5 tay và h\u1ecd ch\u1ea5p nh\u1eadn các \u0111i\u1ec1u kho\u1ea3n. Vui lòng s\u1eafp x\u1ebfp v\u1edbi qu\u1ea3n lý \u0111\u1ec3 tham d\u1ef1 m\u1ed9t trong nh\u1eefng bu\u1ed5i này.<\/p>

Alex Muresianu<\/p>"}

---3---<\/p>

A. In summary: Tóm t\u1eaft<\/p>

B. On the other hand: M\u1eb7t khác<\/p>

C. As a matter of fact: Nh\u01b0 m\u1ed9t v\u1ea5n \u0111\u1ec1 th\u1ef1c t\u1ebf<\/p>

D. Immediately afterward: Ngay l\u1eadp t\u1ee9c sau \u0111ó<\/p>","en":"

---3---<\/p>

A. In summary: In a short statement that gives only the main points of something<\/p>

B. On the other hand: used to introduce different points of view, ideas, etc., especially when they are opposites<\/p>

C. As a matter of fact: used to emphasize a statement, especially one that is the opposite of what has just been mentioned<\/p>

D. Immediately afterward: without delay at a later time<\/p>"}

parts.name: Reading comprehension
parts.title: In this part you will read a selection of texts, such as magezine and newspaper articles, letters, and advertisements. Each text is followed by several questions. Select the best answer for each question and mark the letter (A), (B), (C) or (D) on your answer sheet.

intro.title:
Example:
Are you someone who enjoys trying new things and does not feel uncomfortable in new environment? Then why not get paid for it? CULTURE magazine is looking for individuals to go to ne

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

H\u1ed9i th\u1ea3o bán hàng b\u1eefa tr\u01b0a<\/p>

Nhân viên bán hàng chú ý! B\u1ea1n m\u1edbi \u0111\u1ebfn Hãng bán l\u1ebb tr\u1ef1c ti\u1ebfp CMG? B\u1ea3ng bán hàng c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n có v\u1ebb h\u01a1i ng\u1eafn? B\u1ea1n có mu\u1ed1n t\u0103ng hoa h\u1ed3ng c\u1ee7a mình nh\u01b0ng d\u01b0\u1eddng nh\u01b0 không th\u1ec3 ki\u1ebfm \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c khách hàng m\u1edbi? Hãy \u0111\u1ebfn v\u1edbi h\u1ed9i th\u1ea3o b\u1eefa tr\u01b0a c\u1ee7a tháng này, n\u01a1i Giám \u0111\u1ed1c bán hàng c\u1ea5p cao Chad Avakian s\u1ebd chia s\u1ebb bí quy\u1ebft c\u1ee7a mình \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111\u1ecbnh v\u1ecb, b\u1ea3o m\u1eadt và m\u1edf r\u1ed9ng tài kho\u1ea3n m\u1edbi!<\/p>

B\u1eefa tr\u01b0a không \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c cung c\u1ea5p, vì v\u1eady hãy mang theo \u0111\u1ed3 \u0103n cho mình. Sau cu\u1ed9c h\u1ecdp, b\u1ea3n ghi k\u1ef9 thu\u1eadt s\u1ed1 c\u1ee7a toàn b\u1ed9 bài thuy\u1ebft trình s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c cung c\u1ea5p trên trang web \u0111ào t\u1ea1o c\u1ee7a công ty, vì v\u1eady các b\u1ea1n không c\u1ea7n ph\u1ea3i mang theo máy tính xách tay \u0111\u1ec3 ghi chép. Vui lòng tr\u1ea3 l\u1eddi cho b\u1ed9 ph\u1eadn \u0111ào t\u1ea1o t\u1ea1i \u0111\u1ecba ch\u1ec9 events@cmgdr.com \u0111\u1ec3 gi\u1eef ch\u1ed7.<\/p>"}

{"vn":"

Pryan Clothing (5:05 CH): Xin chào. C\u1ea3m \u01a1n b\u1ea1n \u0111ã liên h\u1ec7 v\u1edbi Pryan Clothing. Hôm nay tôi có th\u1ec3 giúp gì cho b\u1ea1n?<\/p>

Marina Soler (5:06 CH): Xin chào. Tôi \u0111ã c\u1ed1 g\u1eafng mua m\u1ed9t chi\u1ebfc qu\u1ea7n dài trên trang web c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n — m\u1eb7t hàng # CP3984. Nh\u01b0ng khi tôi nh\u1ea5p chu\u1ed9t vào, tôi v\u1eabn nh\u1eadn \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c thông báo l\u1ed7i.<\/p>

Pryan Clothing (5:07 CH): Tôi r\u1ea5t ti\u1ebfc v\u1ec1 \u0111i\u1ec1u \u0111ó. Hãy \u0111\u1ec3 tôi xem n\u1ebfu tôi có th\u1ec3 giúp b\u1ea1n. Tôi có th\u1ec3 \u0111\u1eb7t hàng cho b\u1ea1n và sau \u0111ó g\u1eedi email xác nh\u1eadn mua hàng cho b\u1ea1n.<\/p>

Marina Soler (5:08 CH): Tôi \u0111ánh giá cao \u0111i\u1ec1u \u0111ó.<\/p>

Pryan Clothing (5:09 CH): B\u1ea1n mu\u1ed1n màu gì và c\u1ee1 nào?<\/p>

Marina Soler (5:09 CH): C\u1ee1 10, màu \u0111en.<\/p>

Pryan Clothing (5:10 CH): Tôi có th\u1ec3 s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng s\u1ed1 th\u1ebb tín d\u1ee5ng mà chúng tôi có trong h\u1ed3 s\u01a1 cho b\u1ea1n không?<\/p>

Marina Soler (5:10 CH): \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c nhé.<\/p>

Pryan Clothing (5:12 CH): Tôi \u0111ã g\u1eedi email cho b\u1ea1n yêu c\u1ea7u \u0111\u1eb7t hàng. Hãy cho chúng tôi bi\u1ebft n\u1ebfu b\u1ea1n có b\u1ea5t k\u1ef3 v\u1ea5n \u0111\u1ec1 nào khác.<\/p>

Marina Soler (5:13 CH): C\u1ea3m \u01a1n b\u1ea1n r\u1ea5t nhi\u1ec1u.<\/p>"}

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

H\u1ecdc vi\u1ec7n k\u1ef9 thu\u1eadt Bower t\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c cho h\u1ecdc sinh khách m\u1eddi<\/p>

(Ngày 27 tháng 4) —Theo m\u1ed9t báo cáo g\u1ea7n \u0111ây c\u1ee7a chính ph\u1ee7, nhu c\u1ea7u v\u1ec1 công nhân c\u01a1 khí \u0111\u1ed9ng c\u01a1 diesel d\u1ef1 ki\u1ebfn s\u1ebd t\u0103ng 15% trong m\u01b0\u1eddi n\u0103m t\u1edbi. Ngày càng có nhi\u1ec1u nhu c\u1ea7u v\u1ec1 công nhân c\u01a1 khí \u0111\u1ed9ng c\u01a1 diesel trong các ngành xây d\u1ef1ng, d\u1ea7u m\u1ecf và công nghi\u1ec7p \u0111i\u1ec7n. H\u1ea7u h\u1ebft các v\u1ecb trí tr\u1ea3 l\u01b0\u01a1ng r\u1ea5t cao và ch\u1ec9 yêu c\u1ea7u b\u1eb1ng t\u1ed1t nghi\u1ec7p trung h\u1ecdc và \u0111ào t\u1ea1o k\u1ef9 thu\u1eadt. H\u1ecdc vi\u1ec7n K\u1ef9 thu\u1eadt Bower \u1edf Centreville s\u1ebd cung c\u1ea5p khóa \u0111ào t\u1ea1o \u0111ó.<\/p>

Vào ngày 1 tháng 5, H\u1ecdc vi\u1ec7n K\u1ef9 thu\u1eadt Bower m\u1eddi b\u1ea1n làm khách m\u1eddi t\u1eeb 9 gi\u1edd sáng \u0111\u1ebfn 2 gi\u1edd chi\u1ec1u. Sau ph\u1ea7n h\u1ecfi-\u0111áp v\u1ec1 ngh\u1ec1, các h\u1ecdc sinh khách m\u1eddi s\u1ebd tham quan các l\u1edbp h\u1ecdc c\u01a1 khí \u0111\u1ed9ng c\u01a1 diesel th\u1ef1c t\u1ebf, t\u1eadp trung vào các \u0111oàn tàu \u0111i\u1ec7n và h\u1ec7 th\u1ed1ng qu\u1ea3n lý \u0111\u1ed9ng c\u01a1. Sau \u0111ó, sinh viên khách m\u1eddi có th\u1ec3 tham gia vào các bu\u1ed5i th\u1ef1c hành \u0111\u1ec3 tr\u1ea3i nghi\u1ec7m m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 công vi\u1ec7c h\u1eb1ng ng ngày liên quan \u0111\u1ebfn l\u0129nh v\u1ef1c này.<\/p>

S\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n là mi\u1ec5n phí, nh\u01b0ng không gian có h\u1ea1n. Ng\u01b0\u1eddi tham gia ph\u1ea3i có b\u1eb1ng t\u1ed1t nghi\u1ec7p trung h\u1ecdc ho\u1eb7c ch\u1ee9ng ch\u1ec9 t\u01b0\u01a1ng \u0111\u01b0\u01a1ng. G\u1eedi email cho Taneisha Hill theo \u0111\u1ecba ch\u1ec9 thill@bowertech.com \u0111\u1ec3 gi\u1eef ch\u1ed7.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: What is indicated about industries that rely on diesel mechanics?
childrens.answers: ["They have increased their profits by 15 percent.","They will need more trained technicians.","Their workers are underpaid.","They are growing quickly in Centerville."]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

\u0110i\u1ec1u gì \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ch\u1ec9 ra v\u1ec1 các ngành công nghi\u1ec7p ph\u1ee5 thu\u1ed9c vào c\u01a1 khí diesel?<\/p>

A. H\u1ecd \u0111ã t\u0103ng l\u1ee3i nhu\u1eadn lên 15%.<\/p>

B. H\u1ecd s\u1ebd c\u1ea7n nhi\u1ec1u k\u1ef9 thu\u1eadt viên \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111ào t\u1ea1o h\u01a1n.<\/p>

C. Công nhân c\u1ee7a h\u1ecd b\u1ecb tr\u1ea3 l\u01b0\u01a1ng th\u1ea5p.<\/p>

D. H\u1ecd \u0111ang phát tri\u1ec3n nhanh chóng \u1edf Centreville.<\/p>###

According to a recent government report, the demand for diesel mechanics is expected to increase by 15 percent in the next ten years.<\/p>","en":"

A. They have increased their profits by 15 percent.<\/p>

B. They will need more trained technicians.<\/p>

D. They are growing quickly in Centerville.<\/p>###

According to a recent government report, the demand for diesel mechanics is expected to increase by 15 percent in the next ten years.<\/p>"}

B - The event is free [...]<\/p>","en":"

What will guest students NOT be able to do at the event?<\/p>

A. Ask questions about the field<\/p>

B. Attend free classes<\/p>

C. Take part in practice tasks<\/p>

D. Earn credit toward a diploma<\/p>###

A - After a question-and-answer session about the profession, guest students will observe actual diesel mechanic classes that focus on power trains and engine management systems. <\/p>

C - Later, guest students can participate in hands—on sessions to experience some of the day—to—day tasks involved in the \ufb01eld.<\/p>

B - The event is free [...]<\/p>"}

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

T\u1eeb: Yu Egami<\/p>

\u0110\u1ebfn: Nhân viên k\u1ebf toán<\/p>

Ngày: 21 tháng 8<\/p>

Ch\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ec1: Chia tay Jonah<\/p>

Xin chào, Nhóm K\u1ebf toán,<\/p>

Nh\u01b0 các b\u1ea1n có th\u1ec3 \u0111ã nghe, Jonah Katzberg s\u1ebd r\u1eddi \u0111i vào cu\u1ed1i tháng \u0111\u1ec3 tìm m\u1ed9t công vi\u1ec7c m\u1edbi \u1edf Vancouver. Tôi bi\u1ebft r\u1eb1ng m\u1ecdi ng\u01b0\u1eddi s\u1ebd không còn th\u1ea5y s\u1ef1 c\u1ed1ng hi\u1ebfn t\u1ea1i n\u01a1i làm vi\u1ec7c và khi\u1ebfu hài h\u01b0\u1edbc c\u1ee7a anh \u1ea5y n\u1eefa. Chúng ta hãy nói l\u1eddi t\u1ea1m bi\u1ec7t và g\u1eedi nh\u1eefng l\u1eddi chúc t\u1ed1t \u0111\u1eb9p nh\u1ea5t c\u1ee7a chúng ta vào tr\u01b0a mai trong phòng h\u1ecdp. Bánh mì sandwich cùng v\u1edbi bánh ng\u1ecdt và các lo\u1ea1i \u0111\u1ed3 u\u1ed1ng s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ph\u1ee5c v\u1ee5. Chúng ta mu\u1ed1n \u0111i\u1ec1u này là m\u1ed9t b\u1ea5t ng\u1edd, vì v\u1eady vui lòng không \u0111\u1ec1 c\u1eadp b\u1ea5t c\u1ee9 \u0111i\u1ec1u gì v\u1edbi Jonah. Không ai s\u1ebd mua quà, nh\u01b0ng hãy mang theo nh\u1eefng câu chuy\u1ec7n hay nh\u1ea5t c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n và n\u1ebfu b\u1ea1n có b\u1ea5t k\u1ef3 b\u1ee9c \u1ea3nh ch\u1ee5p nhanh nào th\u1ef1c s\u1ef1 ghi l\u1ea1i th\u1eddi gian chúng ta \u0111ã chia s\u1ebb cùng nhau trong nhi\u1ec1u n\u0103m, hãy chuy\u1ec3n chúng cho tôi. Tôi \u0111ang t\u1ea1o m\u1ed9t trình chi\u1ebfu ng\u1eafn \u0111\u1ec3 t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 chúng ta cùng th\u01b0\u1edfng th\u1ee9c.<\/p>

C\u1ea3m \u01a1n,<\/p>

Yu Egami, Tr\u1ee3 lý Giám \u0111\u1ed1c K\u1ebf toán<\/p>"}

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

Nhân viên nhà máy: Gi\u1edd ngh\u1ec9 gi\u1ea3i lao<\/p>

Nhân viên toàn th\u1eddi gian c\u1ee7a nhà máy \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ngh\u1ec9 ba l\u1ea7n m\u1ed7i ngày và \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c khuy\u1ebfn khích th\u1ef1c hi\u1ec7n. Vui lòng tham gia vào b\u1ea5t k\u1ef3 công vi\u1ec7c cá nhân nào trong th\u1eddi gian ngh\u1ec9 này. - [1] -. Nh\u1eefng ng\u01b0\u1eddi làm \u0111\u1ee7 ca tám gi\u1edd có th\u1ec3 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ngh\u1ec9 m\u01b0\u1eddi l\u0103m phút vào bu\u1ed5i sáng và m\u01b0\u1eddi l\u0103m phút n\u1eefa vào bu\u1ed5i chi\u1ec1u. Gi\u1edd ngh\u1ec9 tr\u01b0a kéo dài 30 phút.<\/p>

Có m\u1ed9t khu v\u1ef1c ngh\u1ec9 ng\u01a1i \u1edf t\u1ea7ng tr\u1ec7t bao g\u1ed3m m\u1ed9t nhà b\u1ebfp và m\u1ed9t phòng khách cho nhân viên. - [2] -. Xin l\u01b0u ý r\u1eb1ng t\u1ee7 l\u1ea1nh \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c d\u1ecdn d\u1eb9p vào t\u1ed1i th\u1ee9 Sáu h\u1eb1ng tu\u1ea7n, vì v\u1eady hãy nh\u1edb mang v\u1ec1 nhà nh\u1eefng th\u1ef1c ph\u1ea9m còn sót l\u1ea1i mà b\u1ea1n mu\u1ed1n \u0111\u1ec3 dành.<\/p>

Có t\u1ee7 khóa trong s\u1ea3nh nhân viên \u0111\u1ec3 l\u01b0u tr\u1eef các v\u1eadt d\u1ee5ng cá nhân. - [3] -. Nhân viên \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c tho\u1ea3i mái s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng các phòng v\u1ec7 sinh li\u1ec1n k\u1ec1 v\u1edbi phòng ch\u1edd nhân viên. - [4] -.<\/p>"}
