questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

Saxal Paper Goods, Inc., mua l\u1ea1i Bear Industrial<\/p>

TORONTO (9 tháng 5) —Tháng tr\u01b0\u1edbc, Saxal Paper Goods, Inc. (SPG), có tr\u1ee5 s\u1edf t\u1ea1i Mississauga, thông báo r\u1eb1ng h\u1ecd \u0111ã mua l\u1ea1i Bear Industrial. Nhà phân ph\u1ed1i bao bì th\u1ef1c ph\u1ea9m và các s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m gi\u1ea5y cho bi\u1ebft th\u1ecfa thu\u1eadn v\u1edbi Bear Industrial s\u1ebd giúp h\u1ecd thi\u1ebft l\u1eadp c\u01a1 s\u1edf t\u1ea1i m\u1ed9t khu v\u1ef1c m\u1edbi nh\u01b0 m\u1ed9t ph\u1ea7n c\u1ee7a sáng ki\u1ebfn m\u1edf r\u1ed9ng c\u0169ng nh\u01b0 thâm nh\u1eadp vào vi\u1ec7c kinh doanh các ngu\u1ed3n cung c\u1ea5p d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 th\u1ef1c ph\u1ea9m dùng m\u1ed9t l\u1ea7n. Bear Industrial ph\u1ee5c v\u1ee5 nhi\u1ec1u c\u01a1 s\u1edf t\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c \u1edf Quebec và các khu v\u1ef1c lân c\u1eadn.<\/p>

“Bear Industrial là m\u1ed9t trong nh\u1eefng nhà phân ph\u1ed1i lâu \u0111\u1eddi nh\u1ea5t và có uy tín nh\u1ea5t \u1edf Quebec, và chúng tôi r\u1ea5t vui m\u1eebng \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c mua l\u1ea1i m\u1ed9t công ty t\u1ed1t nh\u01b0 v\u1eady và m\u1edf r\u1ed9ng ra khu v\u1ef1c,” Ch\u1ee7 t\u1ecbch Arne Wellington nói v\u1edbi các phóng viên \u0111\u1ecba ph\u01b0\u01a1ng t\u1ea1i m\u1ed9t cu\u1ed9c h\u1ecdp báo. “Chúng tôi hoan nghênh các nhân viên c\u1ee7a Bear Industrial \u0111\u1ebfn v\u1edbi SPG và mong mu\u1ed1n \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c làm vi\u1ec7c cùng nhau vì l\u1ee3i ích c\u1ee7a t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 m\u1ecdi ng\u01b0\u1eddi.” Ông nói thêm r\u1eb1ng không có công nhân nào b\u1ecb m\u1ea5t vi\u1ec7c làm do th\u01b0\u01a1ng v\u1ee5 mua l\u1ea1i.<\/p>

Wellington cho bi\u1ebft: “Vi\u1ec7c mua l\u1ea1i Bear Industrial là b\u01b0\u1edbc quan tr\u1ecdng trong chi\u1ebfn l\u01b0\u1ee3c c\u1ee7a SPG nh\u1eb1m thi\u1ebft l\u1eadp công ty c\u1ee7a chúng tôi tr\u1edf thành m\u1ed9t trong nh\u1eefng nhà cung c\u1ea5p bao bì th\u1ef1c ph\u1ea9m, s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m gi\u1ea5y và th\u1ef1c ph\u1ea9m dùng m\u1ed9t l\u1ea7n”. “M\u1ee5c tiêu c\u1ee7a chúng tôi là m\u1edf r\u1ed9ng ph\u1ea1m vi ti\u1ebfp c\u1eadn theo \u0111\u1ecba lý thông qua quan h\u1ec7 \u0111\u1ed1i tác v\u1edbi các công ty và nhà khai thác hàng \u0111\u1ea7u trong ngành.”<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Why did SPG purchase Bear Industrial?
childrens.answers: ["SPG needed to be closer to its suppliers.","SPG wished to expand its business in a different region.","Bear Industrial had more advanced manufacturing equipment.","Bear Industrial was going out of business."]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

T\u1ea1i sao SPG mua Bear Industrial?<\/p>

A. SPG c\u1ea7n ph\u1ea3i g\u1ea7n g\u0169i h\u01a1n v\u1edbi các nhà cung c\u1ea5p c\u1ee7a mình.<\/p>

B. SPG mu\u1ed1n m\u1edf r\u1ed9ng ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng kinh doanh c\u1ee7a mình \u1edf m\u1ed9t khu v\u1ef1c khác.<\/p>

C. Bear Industrial có thi\u1ebft b\u1ecb s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t tiên ti\u1ebfn h\u01a1n.<\/p>

D. Bear Industrial \u0111ã ng\u1eebng kinh doanh.<\/p>###

The distributor of food packaging and paper products said the deal for Bear Industrial will help it establish a base in a new area as part of an initiative to expand [...].<\/p>","en":"

Why did SPG purchase Bear Industrial?<\/p>

A. SPG needed to be closer to its suppliers.<\/p>

B. SPG wished to expand its business in a different region.<\/p>

C. Bear Industrial had more advanced manufacturing equipment.<\/p>

D. Bear Industrial was going out of business.<\/p>###

The distributor of food packaging and paper products said the deal for Bear Industrial will help it establish a base in a new area as part of an initiative to expand [...].<\/p>"}

childrens.title: What is true about the products produced by Bear Industrial?
childrens.answers: ["They are Intended to be thrown away after use.","They are used in fine restaurants.","They are Imported to Quebec.","They are undergoing redesign."]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

\u0110âu là s\u1ef1 th\u1eadt v\u1ec1 s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m do Bear công nghi\u1ec7p s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t?<\/p>

A. Chúng \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c d\u1ef1 \u0111\u1ecbnh s\u1ebd v\u1ee9t b\u1ecf sau khi s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng.<\/p>

B. Chúng \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng trong các nhà hàng cao c\u1ea5p.<\/p>

C. Chúng \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c nh\u1eadp kh\u1ea9u \u0111\u1ebfn Quebec.<\/p>

D. Chúng \u0111ang \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf l\u1ea1i.<\/p>###

The distributor of food packaging and paper products said the deal for Bear Industrial will help [...] break into sales of disposable food-service supplies. <\/p>","en":"

What is true about the products produced by Bear industrial?<\/p>

A. They are intended to be thrown away after use.<\/p>

B. They are used in fine restaurants.<\/p>

C. They are imported to Quebec.<\/p>

D. They are undergoing redesign.<\/p>###

The distributor of food packaging and paper products said the deal for Bear Industrial will help [...] break into sales of disposable food-service supplies. <\/p>"}

childrens.title: According to the article, what will SPG likely do in the future?
childrens.answers: ["Reduce staff","Relocate its headquarters to Quebec","Work with other companies similar to Bear Industrial","Appoint a new president"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Theo bài báo, SPG có kh\u1ea3 n\u0103ng s\u1ebd làm \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c gì trong t\u01b0\u01a1ng lai?<\/p>

A. Gi\u1ea3m nhân viên<\/p>

B. Chuy\u1ec3n tr\u1ee5 s\u1edf \u0111\u1ebfn Quebec<\/p>

C. Làm vi\u1ec7c v\u1edbi các công ty khác t\u01b0\u01a1ng t\u1ef1 nh\u01b0 Bear Industrial<\/p>

D. B\u1ed5 nhi\u1ec7m m\u1ed9t ch\u1ee7 t\u1ecbch m\u1edbi<\/p>###

Our goal is to expand our geographic reach through partnerships with industry-leading companies and operators.<\/p>","en":"

According to the article, what will SPG likely do in the future?<\/p>

A. Reduce staff<\/p>

B. Relocate its headquarters to Quebec<\/p>

C. Work with other companies similar to Bear industrial<\/p>

D. Appoint a new president<\/p>###

Our goal is to expand our geographic reach through partnerships with industry-leading companies and operators.<\/p>"}

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

Shari Shu [9:35 SA]:<\/p>

Cô có th\u1ea5y e-mail tôi \u0111ã g\u1eedi cho cô tr\u01b0\u1edbc \u0111ó không? Công ty chúng ta \u0111ã t\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c m\u1ed9t \u0111\u1ee3t quyên góp toàn công ty vào tháng t\u1edbi. Chúng ta s\u1ebd thu th\u1eadp máy tính và thi\u1ebft b\u1ecb \u0111i\u1ec7n t\u1eed \u0111ã qua s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng cho m\u1ed9t nhóm phi l\u1ee3i nhu\u1eadn.<\/p>

Jennifer Bech [9:37 SA]:<\/p>

Vâng, tôi \u0111ã th\u1ea5y. Cám \u01a1n \u0111ã chia s\u1ebb. Tôi có th\u1ec3 giúp chia s\u1ebb trên m\u1ea1ng xã h\u1ed9i n\u1ebfu b\u1ea1n mu\u1ed1n.<\/p>

Shari Shu [9:38 SA]:<\/p>

\u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111ó. Cô c\u0169ng hay \u1edf trên m\u1ea1ng. Ngoài ra, tr\u01b0\u1edbc \u0111ây cô có liên h\u1ec7 v\u1edbi biên t\u1eadp viên c\u1ee7a Yakima Daily News không? Tôi mu\u1ed1n liên h\u1ec7 v\u1edbi biên t\u1eadp viên, nh\u01b0ng tôi không th\u1ec3 tìm th\u1ea5y \u0111\u1ecba ch\u1ec9 tr\u1ef1c tuy\u1ebfn.<\/p>

Jennifer Bech [9:39 SA]:<\/p>

Vâng, nh\u01b0ng \u0111ã qua nhi\u1ec1u n\u0103m. Tôi ngh\u0129 bây gi\u1edd \u0111ã có biên t\u1eadp viên m\u1edbi. \u0110\u1ec3 tôi ki\u1ec3m tra.<\/p>

Shari Shu [9:40 SA]:<\/p>

Chúng ta \u0111ã vi\u1ebft m\u1ed9t thông cáo báo chí r\u1eb1ng chúng ta mu\u1ed1n g\u1eedi email \u0111\u1ebfn các c\u01a1 quan báo chí khác nhau vào ngày mai.<\/p>

Jennifer Bech [9:44 SA]:<\/p>

Vâng, có m\u1ed9t biên t\u1eadp viên m\u1edbi: Dale Korman. Tôi không có \u0111\u1ecba ch\u1ec9 email c\u1ee7a anh \u1ea5y, nh\u01b0ng t\u1eeb các \u0111\u1ecba ch\u1ec9 liên h\u1ec7 c\u0169 mà tôi có, có v\u1ebb nh\u01b0 t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 h\u1ecd \u0111\u1ec1u s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng cùng m\u1ed9t quy \u01b0\u1edbc \u0111\u1eb7t tên. Tôi mu\u1ed1n th\u1eed d.korman@yakimanews.com. \u0110ó là d\u1ef1 \u0111oán t\u1ed1t nh\u1ea5t c\u1ee7a tôi.<\/p>"}

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

\u0110ã s\u1eb5n sàng, m\u1edf Tr\u1ea1i h\u1ecdp b\u1ea1n nào!<\/p>

NASSAU (20 tháng 6) —M\u1ed7i n\u0103m khác, Nassau l\u1ea1i b\u1ecb nh\u1eefng ng\u01b0\u1eddi yêu thích nh\u1ea1c Afrobeat, m\u1ed9t phong cách âm nh\u1ea1c k\u1ebft h\u1ee3p nh\u1ecbp \u0111i\u1ec7u nh\u1ea3y múa truy\u1ec1n th\u1ed1ng châu Phi v\u1edbi nh\u1ea1c jazz và funk. Tr\u1ea1i h\u1ecdp b\u1ea1n nh\u1ea1c Afrobeat l\u1ea7n th\u1ee9 t\u01b0 t\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c hai n\u0103m m\u1ed9t l\u1ea7n, \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c bi\u1ebft \u0111\u1ebfn nhi\u1ec1u h\u01a1n v\u1edbi tên g\u1ecdi “Afrojam”, s\u1ebd di\u1ec5n ra t\u1eeb ngày 18 tháng 7 \u0111\u1ebfn ngày 22 tháng 7. - [1] -.<\/p>

Afrojam s\u1ebd có s\u1ef1 góp m\u1eb7t c\u1ee7a các nh\u1ea1c s\u0129 t\u1eeb kh\u1eafp n\u01a1i trên th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi, bao g\u1ed3m Nigeria, V\u01b0\u01a1ng qu\u1ed1c Anh và t\u1ea5t nhiên là Bahamas. Doanh s\u1ed1 bán vé g\u1ea7n \u0111ây cho th\u1ea5y Afrojam n\u0103m nay s\u1ebd thu hút m\u1ed9t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng khán gi\u1ea3 l\u1edbn h\u01a1n so v\u1edbi hai n\u0103m tr\u01b0\u1edbc, \u0111i\u1ec1u này gi\u1ea3i thích cho vi\u1ec7c chuy\u1ec3n \u0111\u1ebfn Nhà hát vòng tròn Ashanti. - [2] -. Thông tin chi ti\u1ebft b\u1ed5 sung v\u1ec1 s\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n này có t\u1ea1i www.afrojam.org.bs.<\/p>

Khách truy c\u1eadp vào afrojam.org.bs c\u0169ng có th\u1ec3 th\u01b0\u1edfng th\u1ee9c các video clip v\u1ec1 m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 kho\u1ea3nh kh\u1eafc tr\u1ecdng \u0111\u1ea1i nh\u1ea5t trong quá kh\u1ee9, ch\u1eb3ng h\u1ea1n nh\u01b0 s\u1ef1 xu\u1ea5t hi\u1ec7n b\u1ea5t ng\u1edd c\u1ee7a Strawberry Jam n\u1ed5i ti\u1ebfng th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi, m\u1ed9t nhóm nh\u1ea1c \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c nhi\u1ec1u ng\u01b0\u1eddi dân thành ph\u1ed1 yêu thích. - [3] -.<\/p>

S\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n n\u0103m nay có m\u1ed9t \u0111i\u1ec3m m\u1edbi: gi\u1ea3m giá các b\u1eefa \u0103n. Nh\u1eefng ng\u01b0\u1eddi tham d\u1ef1 l\u1ec5 h\u1ed9i ch\u1ec9 c\u1ea7n xu\u1ea5t trình cu\u1ed1ng vé c\u1ee7a h\u1ecd t\u1ea1i các nhà hàng tham gia \u0111\u1ec3 nh\u1eadn \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c gi\u1ea3m giá 10% trên hóa \u0111\u01a1n. Gi\u1ea3m giá ch\u1ec9 di\u1ec5n ra vào bu\u1ed5i t\u1ed1i hòa nh\u1ea1c. - [4] -.<\/p>

Ban t\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c khuy\u1ebfn khích các ch\u1ee7 nhà hàng \u0111\u1ecba ph\u01b0\u01a1ng t\u1eeb kh\u1eafp Nassau cân nh\u1eafc tham gia. Nh\u1eefng ng\u01b0\u1eddi quan tâm có th\u1ec3 g\u1ecdi s\u1ed1 555-0171 ho\u1eb7c \u0111i\u1ec1n \u0111\u01a1n \u0111\u0103ng ký t\u1ea1i www.afrojam.org.bs\/sponsors.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: What is NOT indicated about Afrojam?
childrens.answers: ["It takes place once every two years.","It has become more popular over time.","It has been organized three times before.","It is usually held in the Ashanti Amphitheatre."]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

\u0110i\u1ec1u gì KHÔNG \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ch\u1ec9 ra v\u1ec1 Afrojam?<\/p>

A. Di\u1ec5n ra hai n\u0103m m\u1ed9t l\u1ea7n.<\/p>

D. Th\u01b0\u1eddng \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c t\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c \u1edf Ashanti Amphitheatre.<\/p>###

Recent ticket sales indicate that this year’s Afrojam will draw an even bigger crowd than it did two years ago, which explains the move to the Ashanti Amphitheatre. <\/p>","en":"

What is NOT indicated about Afrojam?<\/p>

A. It takes place once every two years.<\/p>

B. It has become more popular over time.<\/p>

C. It has been organized three times before.<\/p>

D. It is usually held in the Ashanti Amphitheatre.<\/p>###

Recent ticket sales indicate that this year’s Afrojam will draw an even bigger crowd than it did two years ago, which explains the move to the Ashanti Amphitheatre. <\/p>"}

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

*Th\u01b0 \u0111i\u1ec7n t\u1eed*<\/p>

\u0110\u1ebfn: Toàn th\u1ec3 nhân viên<\/p>

T\u1eeb: Carol Yates<\/p>

Ch\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ec1: H\u1ed9i ngh\u1ecb CCS<\/p>

Ngày: 1 tháng 6<\/p>

T\u1ec7p \u0111ính kèm: ? L\u1ecbch trình h\u1ed9i ngh\u1ecb<\/p>

Nhân viên thân m\u1ebfn,<\/p>

H\u1ed9i ngh\u1ecb th\u01b0\u1eddng niên l\u1ea7n th\u1ee9 12 c\u1ee7a Hi\u1ec7p h\u1ed9i \u1ea8m th\u1ef1c Caribe (CCS) s\u1ebd di\u1ec5n ra t\u1ea1i Jamaica t\u1eeb ngày 16 \u0111\u1ebfn ngày 20 tháng 7 t\u1edbi \u0111ây. Tôi \u0111ã nh\u1eadn \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c yêu c\u1ea7u t\u1eeb b\u1ebfp tr\u01b0\u1edfng Regina Tufton, ch\u1ee7 t\u1ecbch ban t\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c, ti\u1ebfn hành hai h\u1ed9i th\u1ea3o. Th\u1eadt vinh d\u1ef1 khi \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c m\u1eddi b\u1edfi m\u1ed9t chuyên gia \u1ea9m th\u1ef1c xu\u1ea5t s\u1eafc nh\u01b0 v\u1eady, m\u1ed9t ng\u01b0\u1eddi c\u0169ng là tác gi\u1ea3 c\u1ee7a nh\u1eefng cu\u1ed1n sách d\u1ea1y n\u1ea5u \u0103n v\u1ec1 \u1ea9m th\u1ef1c Caribe. Quan tr\u1ecdng h\u01a1n, \u0111ây là m\u1ed9t c\u01a1 h\u1ed9i tuy\u1ec7t v\u1eddi \u0111\u1ec3 Nhà hàng Yates gi\u1edbi thi\u1ec7u m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 món ngon \u0111ã \u0111o\u1ea1t gi\u1ea3i th\u01b0\u1edfng c\u1ee7a mình.<\/p>

H\u1ed9i th\u1ea3o \u0111\u1ea7u tiên s\u1ebd t\u1eadp trung vào các k\u1ef9 thu\u1eadt n\u1ea5u \u0103n l\u1ea5y c\u1ea3m h\u1ee9ng t\u1eeb \u1ea9m th\u1ef1c Pháp. Vì Tr\u1ee3 lý b\u1ebfp tr\u01b0\u1edfng Duane Munroe r\u1ea5t xu\u1ea5t s\u1eafc trong l\u0129nh v\u1ef1c này, nên tôi \u0111ã nh\u1edd ông \u1ea5y giúp tôi th\u1ef1c hi\u1ec7n bài thuy\u1ebft trình này. H\u1ed9i th\u1ea3o th\u1ee9 hai s\u1ebd gi\u1ea3i quy\u1ebft nh\u1eefng thách th\u1ee9c và c\u01a1 h\u1ed9i khi \u0111i\u1ec1u hành m\u1ed9t c\u01a1 s\u1edf th\u1ef1c ph\u1ea9m. Vì Zavia Pinnock \u0111ã làm r\u1ea5t t\u1ed1t công vi\u1ec7c qu\u1ea3n lý nhà hàng c\u1ee7a chúng ta. Tôi \u0111ã yêu c\u1ea7u cô \u1ea5y chia s\u1ebb kinh nghi\u1ec7m v\u1ec1 ch\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ec1 này.<\/p>

Tôi khuy\u1ebfn khích m\u1ed7i b\u1ea1n tham gia m\u1ed9t ho\u1eb7c c\u1ea3 hai bu\u1ed5i h\u1ed9i th\u1ea3o. T\u1ea5t nhiên, nhà hàng ph\u1ea3i v\u1eabn m\u1edf c\u1eeda và có \u0111\u1ee7 nhân viên trong su\u1ed1t th\u1eddi gian di\u1ec5n ra h\u1ed9i th\u1ea3o. \u0110\u1ec3 \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o chúng ta có \u0111\u1ee7 nhân viên trong su\u1ed1t th\u1eddi gian di\u1ec5n ra h\u1ed9i th\u1ea3o, vui lòng cho tôi bi\u1ebft tr\u01b0\u1edbc ngày và gi\u1edd di\u1ec5n ra các ph\u1ea7n mà các b\u1ea1n mu\u1ed1n tham d\u1ef1. \u0110\u1ec3 thu\u1eadn ti\u1ec7n cho các b\u1ea1n, m\u1ed9t b\u1ea3n sao c\u1ee7a l\u1ecbch trình h\u1ed9i ngh\u1ecb \u0111ã \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111ính kèm.<\/p>

Trân tr\u1ecdng,<\/p>

Carol Yates<\/p>"}

The 12th annual conference of the Caribbean Culinary Society (CCS) will take place here in Jamaica from 16 to 20 July. [...] I encourage each of you to attend one or more conference sessions.<\/p>","en":"

What is the purpose of the e-mail?<\/p>

A. To establish an organization<\/p>

B. To report on staff promotions<\/p>

C. To announce participation in an event<\/p>

D. To honor the recipients of an award<\/p>###

The 12th annual conference of the Caribbean Culinary Society (CCS) will take place here in Jamaica from 16 to 20 July. [...] I encourage each of you to attend one or more conference sessions.<\/p>"}

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

T\u1eeb: Hiroaki Yoneya <hyoneya@westernstatesmilling.net><\/p>

\u0110\u1ebfn: Clay Crosby <ccrosby@westernstatesmilling.net><\/p>

Ngày: 1 tháng 6<\/p>

Ch\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ec1: \u0110êm bóng chày<\/p>

G\u1eedi Clay,<\/p>

Cô có nh\u1edb g\u1ea7n \u0111ây chúng ta \u0111ã th\u1ea3o lu\u1eadn v\u1ec1 các ý t\u01b0\u1edfng v\u1ec1 chuy\u1ebfn \u0111i ch\u01a1i cho nhân viên và gia \u0111ình. Tôi ngh\u0129 ý t\u01b0\u1edfng hay nh\u1ea5t là \u0111i xem m\u1ed9t tr\u1eadn bóng chày. Tôi luôn thích \u0111\u01b0a gia \u0111ình \u0111i xem Billington Buffaloes, \u0111\u1ed9i \u0111\u1ecba ph\u01b0\u01a1ng c\u1ee7a chúng ta. Cô có th\u1ec3 th\u1ea5y r\u1eb1ng m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 b\u1ee9c \u1ea3nh trong v\u0103n phòng c\u1ee7a tôi \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ch\u1ee5p t\u1ea1i sân v\u1eadn \u0111\u1ed9ng! Và vì tôi th\u01b0\u1eddng th\u1ea5y các nhân viên khác ch\u01a1i môn này nên tôi ngh\u0129 \u0111i\u1ec1u này s\u1ebd thu hút h\u1ea7u h\u1ebft nhóm c\u1ee7a chúng ta.<\/p>

Cô có th\u1ec3 vui lòng lên l\u1ecbch cho d\u1ecbp này vàongày 28 tháng 6 không? Tôi t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 \u0111\u1ec1u có th\u1ec3 th\u1ef1c hi\u1ec7n tr\u1ef1c tuy\u1ebfn n\u1ebfu cô mu\u1ed1n. Theo tính toán c\u1ee7a tôi, chúng ta s\u1ebd c\u1ea7n t\u1ed5ng c\u1ed9ng 45 vé, nh\u01b0ng hãy ki\u1ec3m tra k\u1ef9 s\u1ed1 này. Ngoài ra, tôi mu\u1ed1n ph\u1ee5c v\u1ee5 \u0111\u1ed3 \u0103n. Hãy gi\u1edbi h\u1ea1n chi phí c\u1ee7a chúng ta d\u01b0\u1edbi 20 \u0111ô la\/ng\u01b0\u1eddi và \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o ch\u1ed7 ng\u1ed3i có mái che trong tr\u01b0\u1eddng h\u1ee3p th\u1eddi ti\u1ebft x\u1ea5u. Vui lòng g\u1eedi cho tôi thông tin chi ti\u1ebft ngay sau khi mua vé.<\/p>

C\u1ea3m \u01a1n,<\/p>

Hiroaki Yoneya, Phó Giám \u0111\u1ed1c<\/p>

Western States Milling, Inc.<\/p>

\u25c1<\/span> <\/span>\u25b7<\/span> <\/span>\u21bb<\/span>  <\/span>http:\/\/www.billlngtonbuffaloes.com\/grouptickets<\/span><\/p> <\/td> <\/tr>

Các khu v\u1ef1c nhóm<\/span><\/strong><\/p> <\/td>

Ch\u1ed7 tr\u1ed1ng t\u1ed1i \u0111a<\/span><\/strong><\/p> <\/td>

Giá<\/span><\/strong><\/p> <\/td>

Có mái che<\/span><\/strong><\/p> <\/td> <\/tr>

Home Run Pavilion<\/span><\/p> <\/td>

60 ng\u01b0\u1eddi<\/span><\/p> <\/td>

$17\/ng\u01b0\u1eddi<\/span><\/p> <\/td>

Có<\/span><\/p> <\/td> <\/tr>

First Base Dugout Den<\/span><\/p> <\/td>

50 ng\u01b0\u1eddi<\/span><\/p> <\/td>

$19\/person<\/span><\/p> <\/td>

Không<\/span><\/p> <\/td> <\/tr>

North Side Party Deck<\/span><\/p> <\/td>

60 ng\u01b0\u1eddi<\/span><\/p> <\/td>

$25\/person<\/span><\/p> <\/td>

Không<\/span><\/p> <\/td> <\/tr>

Deluxe Suites<\/span><\/p> <\/td>

50 ng\u01b0\u1eddi<\/span><\/p> <\/td>

$30\/person<\/span><\/p> <\/td>

Có<\/span><\/p> <\/td> <\/tr>

Chính sách vé nhóm<\/span><\/strong><\/p>

- M\u1ed7i thành viên nhóm trong Home Run Pavilion. Khu v\u1ef1c First Base Dugout Den, và North Side Deck s\u1ebd nh\u1eadn \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c m\u1ed9t xúc xích, khoai tây chiên, và m\u1ed9t lon n\u01b0\u1edbc ng\u1ecdt. Các Suite Deluxe bao g\u1ed3m ti\u1ec7c t\u1ef1 ch\u1ecdn có th\u1ec3 l\u1ea5y b\u1ea5t k\u1ef3 món nào cho m\u1ed7i khách.<\/span><\/p>

- M\u1ed7i nhóm s\u1ebd nh\u1eadn \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c m\u1ed9t chuy\u1ebfn th\u0103m \u0111\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t t\u1eeb linh v\u1eadt, Bobby Buffalo.<\/span><\/p>

- Các nhóm s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c chào \u0111ón \u0111\u1ebfn sân v\u1eadn \u0111\u1ed9ng qua h\u1ec7 th\u1ed1ng thông báo.<\/span><\/p>

- M\u1ecdi ng\u01b0\u1eddi trong nhóm s\u1ebd nh\u1eadn \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c gi\u1ea3m giá 10% hàng hóa c\u1ee7a \u0111\u1ed9i (ch\u1ec9 trong ngày di\u1ec5n ra tr\u1eadn \u0111\u1ea5u).<\/span><\/p>

- C\u1ea7n \u0111\u1eb7t c\u1ecdc 25% khi \u0111\u1eb7t ch\u1ed7. S\u1ed1 d\u01b0 còn l\u1ea1i s\u1ebd \u0111\u1ebfn h\u1ea1n thanh toán tr\u01b0\u1edbc hai tu\u1ea7n k\u1ec3 t\u1eeb ngày \u0111ã \u0111\u1eb7t. Vé s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c g\u1eedi qua \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng b\u01b0u \u0111i\u1ec7n khi s\u1ed1 d\u01b0 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c thanh toán.<\/span><\/p>

- Vui lòng g\u1ecdi cho phòng vé theo s\u1ed1 (406) 555 0192 n\u1ebfu có b\u1ea5t k\u1ef3 câu h\u1ecfi nào.<\/span><\/p> <\/td> <\/tr> <\/tbody><\/table>"}

childrens.title: What is the purpose of the e-mail?

childrens.explains:

M\u1ee5c \u0111ích c\u1ee7a e-mail là gì?<\/p>

You may remember that we recently discussed ideas for an outing for the employees and their families. I think the best idea is to go to a baseball game.<\/p>","en":"

childrens.title: What section of the stadium is best for the Western States Milling staff?

By my calculations, we will need 45 tickets in total, but please double-check this number. Also, I would like food to be provided. Let’s limit our cost to under $20 per person and make sure the seating is covered just in case the weather is poor.<\/p>","en":"

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

B\u1edfi Antoine Williams<\/p>

M\u1eb7c dù \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c nhi\u1ec1u ng\u01b0\u1eddi coi là th\u1ee7 ph\u1ee7 c\u1ee7a Ontario, thành ph\u1ed1 Barrie c\u0169ng là n\u01a1i có m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 c\u01a1 s\u1edf b\u01a1i l\u1ed9i công c\u1ed9ng, bao g\u1ed3m c\u1ea3 Vi\u1ec7n Gi\u1ea3i trí Galewood (GRI). Vi\u1ec7n có hai h\u1ed3 b\u01a1i trong nhà, m\u1ed9t h\u1ed3 dùng \u0111\u1ec3 b\u01a1i gi\u1ea3i trí và h\u1ed3 còn l\u1ea1i dành cho các ch\u01b0\u01a1ng trình \u0111\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t, ch\u1eb3ng h\u1ea1n nh\u01b0 d\u1ea1y b\u01a1i và ch\u1ee9ng nh\u1eadn nhân viên c\u1ee9u h\u1ed9.<\/p>

Mùa hè này, h\u1ecdc vi\u1ec7n s\u1ebd b\u1ed5 sung các l\u1edbp h\u1ecdc b\u01a1i chuyên sâu và an toàn có c\u1ea5p ch\u1ee9ng ch\u1ec9. Herbert Gagnon, giám \u0111\u1ed1c vi\u1ec7n cho bi\u1ebft: “\u0110ó là mùa cao \u0111i\u1ec3m c\u1ee7a chúng tôi. “Các h\u1ed3 b\u01a1i c\u1ee7a chúng tôi \u1edf trong nhà, cho phép b\u01a1i l\u1ed9i quanh n\u0103m, nh\u01b0ng vào mùa hè, m\u1ecdi ng\u01b0\u1eddi t\u1ef1 nhiên có nhi\u1ec1u th\u1eddi gian h\u01a1n \u0111\u1ec3 gi\u1ea3i trí và các ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng m\u1edbi nói chung.” Các l\u1edbp h\u1ecdc mùa hè s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c cung c\u1ea5p vào các bu\u1ed5i sáng, bu\u1ed5i chi\u1ec1u và bu\u1ed5i t\u1ed1i. “Chúng tôi hy v\u1ecdng r\u1eb1ng chúng tôi có th\u1ec3 \u0111áp \u1ee9ng l\u1ecbch trình c\u1ee7a m\u1ecdi ng\u01b0\u1eddi,” Gagnon ti\u1ebfp t\u1ee5c. “Các l\u1edbp h\u1ecdc c\u1ee7a chúng tôi không ch\u1ec9 nh\u1eb1m ph\u1ee5c v\u1ee5 tr\u1ebb em mà còn ph\u1ee5c v\u1ee5 t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 các l\u1ee9a tu\u1ed5i và m\u1ee9c \u0111\u1ed9 kinh nghi\u1ec7m.” \u0110\u1ec3 bi\u1ebft thêm thông tin, vui lòng g\u1ecdi 905-555-0142 ho\u1eb7c truy c\u1eadp www.galewoodrec.org<\/p>


<\/p>

\u25c1 \u25b7 \u21bb http:\/\/www.galewoodrec.org\/employment<\/p>

C\u01a1 h\u1ed9i vi\u1ec7c làm<\/p>

Ch\u1ee9c danh: H\u01b0\u1edbng d\u1eabn viên b\u01a1i l\u1ed9i<\/p>

Ngày \u0111\u0103ng: 20\/03<\/p>

Vi\u1ec7n Gi\u1ea3i trí Galewood luôn có nhu c\u1ea7u tuy\u1ec3n d\u1ee5ng h\u01b0\u1edbng d\u1eabn viên b\u01a1i l\u1ed9i \u0111ã \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ch\u1ee9ng nh\u1eadn \u0111\u1ec3 làm vi\u1ec7c t\u1ea1i m\u1ed9t ho\u1eb7c c\u1ea3 hai h\u1ed3 b\u01a1i c\u1ee7a chúng tôi. H\u01b0\u1edbng d\u1eabn viên th\u1ef1c hi\u1ec7n nhi\u1ec7m v\u1ee5 nhân viên c\u1ee9u h\u1ed9, d\u1ea1y các bài h\u1ecdc b\u01a1i h\u1eb1ng tu\u1ea7n, các khóa h\u1ecdc ch\u1ee9ng nh\u1eadn an toàn hàng \u0111\u1ea7u và th\u1ef1c hi\u1ec7n các nhi\u1ec7m v\u1ee5 tiêu chu\u1ea9n khác. Nhu c\u1ea7u v\u1ec1 nhân viên \u0111\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t cao trong nh\u1eefng tháng hè b\u1eadn r\u1ed9n. Các nhân viên c\u1ee7a Vi\u1ec7n \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c k\u1ef3 v\u1ecdng s\u1ebd luôn cung c\u1ea5p d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng hàng \u0111\u1ea7u cho khách hàng quen, vì v\u1eady các \u1ee9ng viên ph\u1ea3i n\u0103ng n\u1ed5 và có k\u1ef9 n\u0103ng giao ti\u1ebfp t\u1ed1t.<\/p>

Ngoài các v\u1ecb trí thông th\u01b0\u1eddng, chúng tôi \u0111ang tìm ki\u1ebfm hai h\u01b0\u1edbng viên quan tâm \u0111\u1ebfn vi\u1ec7c tham gia ch\u01b0\u01a1ng trình giáo d\u1ee5c mùa hè \u0111\u1ed9c \u0111áo dành cho thanh thi\u1ebfu niên. Cùng v\u1edbi vi\u1ec7c có các k\u1ef9 n\u0103ng t\u01b0\u01a1ng t\u1ef1 theo yêu c\u1ea7u c\u1ee7a v\u1ecb trí thông th\u01b0\u1eddng, nh\u1eefng ng\u01b0\u1eddi h\u01b0\u1edbng d\u1eabn \u0111\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t này s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c yêu c\u1ea7u th\u1ef1c hi\u1ec7n m\u1ed9t ch\u01b0\u01a1ng trình gi\u1ea3ng d\u1ea1y \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf và giám sát b\u1edfi T\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c gi\u1ea3ng d\u1ea1y và h\u1ecdc t\u1eadp Ontario. Các \u1ee9ng viên \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ch\u1ecdn tr\u01b0\u1edbc tiên s\u1ebd hoàn thành m\u1ed9t khóa \u0111ào t\u1ea1o kéo dài m\u1ed9t tháng có tr\u1ea3 l\u01b0\u01a1ng vào tháng N\u0103m. H\u1ecd ph\u1ea3i làm vi\u1ec7c vào t\u1ed1i th\u1ee9 Ba và t\u1ed1i th\u1ee9 T\u01b0 t\u1eeb ngày 1 tháng 6 \u0111\u1ebfn h\u1ebft mùa hè.<\/p>

\u1ee8ng viên ph\u1ea3i có t\u1ed1i thi\u1ec3u sáu tháng kinh nghi\u1ec7m gi\u1ea3ng d\u1ea1y và có ch\u1ee9ng ch\u1ec9 hi\u1ec7n t\u1ea1i t\u1eeb m\u1ed9t ch\u01b0\u01a1ng trình \u0111ào t\u1ea1o \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c công nh\u1eadn. Khi \u0111\u0103ng ký, vui lòng t\u1ea3i lên các ch\u1ee9ng nh\u1eadn c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n cùng v\u1edbi s\u01a1 y\u1ebfu lý l\u1ecbch.<\/p>"}

Charlotte Rigby<\/p>"}

- Quisco Ltd., Liverpool: [...] Required to be available evenings, weekends, and holidays.<\/p>

- Ms. Rigby: I am fully able to meet all the requirements of the available position. <\/p>"}

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

Công ty qu\u1ea3n lý tài s\u1ea3n Regal<\/p>

34 \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng Weston, Halifax NS B3J 3P4<\/p>

3 tháng 1<\/p>

Kính g\u1eedi các v\u1ecb \u0111\u1ea1i bi\u1ec3u qu\u1eadn,<\/p>

Công ty tôi mu\u1ed1n mua tòa nhà \u1edf s\u1ed1 1210 ph\u1ed1 Prince. Vì b\u1ea5t \u0111\u1ed9ng s\u1ea3n này \u0111ã có m\u1eb7t trên th\u1ecb tr\u01b0\u1eddng \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c g\u1ea7n n\u0103m n\u0103m, nó \u0111ã r\u01a1i vào tình tr\u1ea1ng h\u01b0 h\u1ecfng. Công ty qu\u1ea3n lý tài s\u1ea3n Regal s\u1eb5n sàng \u0111\u1ea7u t\u01b0 nh\u1eefng gì c\u1ea7n thi\u1ebft \u0111\u1ec3 trùng tu tòa nhà.<\/p>

Ngoài ra, chúng tôi mu\u1ed1n chuy\u1ec3n \u0111\u1ed5i 3 trong s\u1ed1 các c\u0103n h\u1ed9 \u1edf t\u1ea7ng tr\u1ec7t quay m\u1eb7t ra \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng thành không gian kinh doanh. Tuy nhiên, tài s\u1ea3n \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c khoanh vùng ch\u1ec9 \u0111\u1ec3 s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng làm nhà \u1edf. Các ngài có xem xét vi\u1ec7c phân chia l\u1ea1i tài s\u1ea3n \u0111\u1ec3 cho phép s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng làm ch\u1ed7 \u1edf và k\u1ebft h\u1ee3p kinh doanh không?<\/p>

Trân tr\u1ecdng,<\/p>

John Stone, Ch\u1ee7 s\u1edf h\u1eefu<\/p>


<\/p>

H\u1ed9i \u0111\u1ed3ng qu\u1eadn Halifax<\/p>

Biên b\u1ea3n h\u1ecdp ngày 21 tháng 1<\/p>

Tham d\u1ef1: Th\u1ecb tr\u01b0\u1edfng Stuart Kaplan và t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 các thành viên h\u1ed9i \u0111\u1ed3ng<\/p>

Doanh nghi\u1ec7p c\u0169<\/p>

\u2bc8 Thành viên h\u1ed9i \u0111\u1ed3ng Amanda Mueller \u0111ã báo cáo ti\u1ebfn \u0111\u1ed9 kh\u1ea3 quan v\u1ec1 d\u1ef1 án d\u1ecdn d\u1eb9p Công viên Wells.<\/p>

\u2bc8 Thành viên h\u1ed9i \u0111\u1ed3ng Harold Glass \u0111ã \u0111\u1ec7 trình phiên b\u1ea3n cu\u1ed1i cùng c\u1ee7a ngân sách n\u0103m t\u1edbi. Ngân sách \u0111\u1ec1 xu\u1ea5t \u0111ã \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c nh\u1ea5t trí thông qua.<\/p>

Doanh nghi\u1ec7p m\u1edbi<\/p>

C\u01b0 dân trong khu và qu\u1ea3n lý tòa nhà Carla Phillips \u0111ã phát bi\u1ec3u \u0111\u1ec3 ph\u1ea3n \u0111\u1ed1i \u0111\u1ed1i v\u1edbi vi\u1ec7c quy ho\u1ea1ch l\u1ea1i 1210 ph\u1ed1 Prince mà \u0111ang \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c h\u1ed9i \u0111\u1ed3ng xem xét. Bà Phillips lo ng\u1ea1i r\u1eb1ng l\u01b0u l\u01b0\u1ee3ng ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111i b\u1ed9 và xe c\u1ed9 t\u0103ng lên s\u1ebd khi\u1ebfn \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng ph\u1ed1 tr\u1edf nên quá \u0111ông \u0111úc. Bà cho r\u1eb1ng c\u0169ng s\u1ebd r\u1ea5t khó kh\u0103n cho nh\u1eefng c\u01b0 dân trong tòa nhà c\u1ee7a bà, Chung c\u01b0 Lighthouse, t\u1ecda l\u1ea1c t\u1ea1i s\u1ed1 1208 ph\u1ed1 Prince, \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111\u1eadu xe trong khu v\u1ef1c lân c\u1eadn.<\/p>

H\u1ed9i \u0111\u1ed3ng \u0111ã \u0111\u1ed3ng ý xem xét v\u1ea5n \u0111\u1ec1 phân vùng t\u1ea1i cu\u1ed9c h\u1ecdp h\u1eb1ng tháng vào tháng Hai c\u1ee7a h\u1ecd \u0111\u1ec3 t\u1ea1o c\u01a1 h\u1ed9i cho các c\u01b0 dân khác trên ph\u1ed1 Prince nói lên ý ki\u1ebfn c\u1ee7a mình.<\/p>


<\/p>

B\u1ea1n có th\u1ec3 có t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3!<\/p>

T\u1eadn h\u01b0\u1edfng m\u1ed9t phong cách s\u1ed1ng tuy\u1ec7t v\u1eddi t\u1ea1i 1210 ph\u1ed1 Prince!<\/p>

- Các c\u0103n h\u1ed9 m\u1edbi \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c c\u1ea3i t\u1ea1o có m\u1ed9t ho\u1eb7c hai phòng ng\u1ee7<\/p>

- Nhà b\u1ebfp cao c\u1ea5p hi\u1ec7n \u0111\u1ea1i<\/p>

- C\u1eeda s\u1ed5 cách nhi\u1ec7t ba ng\u0103n<\/p>

- Quán cà phê, ti\u1ec7m gi\u1eb7t khô và c\u1eeda hàng ti\u1ec7n l\u1ee3i trên ph\u1ed1<\/p>

- Khu v\u1ef1c \u0111\u1eadu xe m\u1edf r\u1ed9ng dành riêng cho c\u01b0 dân 1208 và 1210 ph\u1ed1 Prince b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u t\u1eeb tháng 12<\/p>

Truy c\u1eadp www.lifeonprincestreet.com ho\u1eb7c g\u1ecdi 866-555-0122 \u0111\u1ec3 bi\u1ebft thêm thông tin.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: What does Mr. Stone’s letter suggest about a property?
childrens.answers: ["It has not been maintained for several years.","It is priced too high for his budget.","It is located close to an area for shopping.","It is no longer for sale."]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Lá th\u01b0 c\u1ee7a ông Stone g\u1ee3i ý gì v\u1ec1 m\u1ed9t tài s\u1ea3n?<\/p>

A. Nó \u0111ã không \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c duy trì trong vài n\u0103m.<\/p>

C. Nó n\u1eb1m g\u1ea7n m\u1ed9t khu v\u1ef1c \u0111\u1ec3 mua s\u1eafm.<\/p>

Since this property has been on the market for almost five years, it has fallen into disrepair.<\/p>","en":"

childrens.title: How did the district council most likely respond to Mr. Stone’s letter?
childrens.answers: ["It supported the renovation of a community hall.","It scheduled a presentation by Regal Properties.","It canceled a February meeting.","It approved a zoning change for a building."]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

H\u1ed9i \u0111\u1ed3ng qu\u1eadn r\u1ea5t có th\u1ec3 \u0111ã tr\u1ea3 l\u1eddi b\u1ee9c th\u01b0 c\u1ee7a ông Stone nh\u01b0 th\u1ebf nào?<\/p>

A. Nó h\u1ed7 tr\u1ee3 vi\u1ec7c c\u1ea3i t\u1ea1o m\u1ed9t h\u1ed9i tr\u01b0\u1eddng c\u1ed9ng \u0111\u1ed3ng.<\/p>

B. Nó \u0111ã lên l\u1ecbch trình bày b\u1edfi Regal Properties.<\/p>

C. Nó \u0111ã h\u1ee7y b\u1ecf m\u1ed9t cu\u1ed9c h\u1ecdp tháng Hai.<\/p>

D. Nó \u0111ã ch\u1ea5p thu\u1eadn thay \u0111\u1ed5i quy ho\u1ea1ch cho m\u1ed9t tòa nhà.<\/p>###

The council agreed to consider the zoning issue at their February monthly meeting to give additional residents on Prince Street an opportunity to voice their opinions.<\/p>","en":"

How did the district council most likely respond to Mr. Stone's letter?<\/p>

A. It supported the renovation of a community hall.<\/p>

B. It scheduled a presentation by Regal Properties.<\/p>

C. It canceled a February meeting.<\/p>

D. It approved a zoning change for a building.<\/p>###

The council agreed to consider the zoning issue at their February monthly meeting to give additional residents on Prince Street an opportunity to voice their opinions.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: What is indicated about the residents of Lighthouse Apartments?

\u0110i\u1ec1u gì \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ch\u1ec9 ra v\u1ec1 c\u01b0 dân c\u1ee7a Chung c\u01b0 Lighthouse?<\/p>

D. Nhi\u1ec1u ng\u01b0\u1eddi trong s\u1ed1 h\u1ecd \u0111i b\u1ed9 \u0111\u1ebfn công vi\u1ec7c c\u1ee7a h\u1ecd.<\/p>###

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

\u0110\u1ebfn: Các thành viên Liên minh Doanh nghi\u1ec7p Linton<\/p>

T\u1eeb: Robin Fowler<\/p>

Ngày: 12 tháng 6<\/p>

Ch\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ec1: Cu\u1ed9c h\u1ecdp t\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c<\/p>

T\u1ec7p \u0111ính kèm: Ch\u01b0\u01a1ng trình ngh\u1ecb s\u1ef1 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111\u1ec1 xu\u1ea5t<\/p>

Xin chào t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 m\u1ecdi ng\u01b0\u1eddi,<\/p>

Tôi liên h\u1ec7 các anh \u0111\u1ec3 xác \u0111\u1ecbnh th\u1eddi gian chúng ta có th\u1ec3 g\u1eb7p nhau. Vì tin t\u1ee9c v\u1ec1 vi\u1ec7c thành l\u1eadp Liên minh Doanh nghi\u1ec7p c\u1ee7a chúng ta \u0111ang nh\u1eadn \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c s\u1ef1 quan tâm trong c\u1ed9ng \u0111\u1ed3ng, nên \u0111ã \u0111\u1ebfn lúc t\u1ea1o m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 tài li\u1ec7u b\u1eb1ng v\u0103n b\u1ea3n \u0111\u1ec3 qu\u1ea3ng bá b\u1ea3n thân.<\/p>

Tôi mu\u1ed1n dành th\u1eddi gian t\u1ea1i cu\u1ed9c h\u1ecdp c\u1ee7a chúng ta \u0111\u1ec3 xây d\u1ef1ng m\u1ed9t k\u1ebf ho\u1ea1ch hành \u0111\u1ed9ng \u0111\u1ec3 thu hút các thành viên. Tôi \u0111ã \u0111ính kèm m\u1ed9t ch\u01b0\u01a1ng trình d\u1ef1 th\u1ea3o. S\u1ebd không m\u1ea5t nhi\u1ec1u th\u1eddi gian \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111i\u1ec1u ph\u1ed1i các nhi\u1ec7m v\u1ee5 c\u1ee7a chúng ta \u0111\u1ec3 nói chuy\u1ec7n v\u1edbi các ch\u1ee7 doanh nghi\u1ec7p \u0111\u1ecba ph\u01b0\u01a1ng, nh\u01b0ng chúng ta có th\u1ec3 ti\u1ebft ki\u1ec7m th\u1eddi gian h\u1ecdp b\u1eb1ng cách th\u1ef1c hi\u1ec7n vi\u1ec7c này tr\u1ef1c tuy\u1ebfn tr\u01b0\u1edbc cu\u1ed9c h\u1ecdp.<\/p>

Vui lòng g\u1eedi cho tôi m\u1ed9t e-mail có s\u1eb5n c\u1ee7a các anh trong vài tu\u1ea7n t\u1edbi. Tôi hi\u1ec3u r\u1eb1ng Sasha Zimmer s\u1ebd v\u1eafng m\u1eb7t cho \u0111\u1ebfn \u0111\u1ea7u tháng 7 nh\u01b0ng tôi v\u1eabn hy v\u1ecdng chúng ta có th\u1ec3 tìm \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ngày gi\u1edd g\u1eb7p m\u1eb7t phù h\u1ee3p v\u1edbi m\u1ecdi ng\u01b0\u1eddi.<\/p>

Robin Fowler<\/p>


<\/p>

Cu\u1ed9c h\u1ecdp t\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c ——— Ch\u01b0\u01a1ng trình ngh\u1ecb s\u1ef1 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111\u1ec1 xu\u1ea5t<\/p>

10:00 SA. Gi\u1edbi thi\u1ec7u<\/p>

10:15 SA. M\u1ee5c 1 — Th\u1ea3o lu\u1eadn \u0111\u1ec3 xác \u0111\u1ecbnh s\u1ee9 m\u1ec7nh và xác \u0111\u1ecbnh ba sáng ki\u1ebfn trong n\u0103m<\/p>

11:00 SA. M\u1ee5c 2 — H\u1ed9i th\u1ea3o \u0111ào t\u1ea1o v\u1ec1 truy\u1ec1n thông v\u1edbi Brandon Clark*<\/p>

12:00 CH. M\u1ee5c 3 — Phân công nhi\u1ec7m v\u1ee5 t\u1ea1o thông tin liên l\u1ea1c c\u1ee7a Alliance: thông cáo báo chí, th\u01b0 g\u1eedi các ch\u1ee7 doanh nghi\u1ec7p \u0111\u1ecba ph\u01b0\u01a1ng, tài li\u1ec7u qu\u1ea3ng cáo và m\u1ed9t trang web nêu b\u1eadt t\u01b0 cách thành viên<\/p>

12:30 CH. M\u1ee5c 4 — Ch\u1ec9 \u0111\u1ecbnh các thành viên Liên minh nói chuy\u1ec7n v\u1edbi ch\u1ee7 doanh nghi\u1ec7p<\/p>

12:45 CH. \u0110i\u1ec1u ch\u1ec9nh<\/p>

* Brandon Clark, m\u1ed9t ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111\u01b0a tin t\u1ea1i M\u1ea1ng tin t\u1ee9c Ulani, \u0111ã \u0111\u1ec1 ngh\u1ecb ch\u1ee7 trì m\u1ed9t h\u1ed9i th\u1ea3o v\u1ec1 t\u01b0\u01a1ng tác v\u1edbi gi\u1edbi truy\u1ec1n thông. Anh \u1ea5y s\u1ebd nh\u1ea5n m\u1ea1nh t\u1ea7m quan tr\u1ecdng c\u1ee7a vi\u1ec7c chu\u1ea9n b\u1ecb các \u0111i\u1ec3m nói chuy\u1ec7n và l\u01b0u ý thông \u0111i\u1ec7p.<\/p>


<\/p>

\u0110\u1ebfn: Các thành viên Liên minh Doanh nghi\u1ec7p Linton<\/p>

T\u1eeb: Robin Fowler<\/p>

Ngày: 22 tháng 6<\/p>

Ch\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ec1: Cu\u1ed9c h\u1ecdp t\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c hoàn thi\u1ec7n<\/p>

T\u1ec7p \u0111ính kèm: Ch\u01b0\u01a1ng trình cu\u1ed1i cùng<\/p>

C\u1ea3m \u01a1n m\u1ecdi ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111ã ph\u1ea3n h\u1ed3i. Ch\u01b0\u01a1ng trình cu\u1ed1i cùng \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111ính kèm. Chúng ta \u0111ã xác nh\u1eadn h\u1ed9i th\u1ea3o di\u1ec5n ra vào ngày 28 tháng 6 t\u1ea1i Th\u01b0 vi\u1ec7n C\u1ed9ng \u0111\u1ed3ng Linton. Th\u01b0 vi\u1ec7n m\u1edf c\u1eeda lúc 10:00 A.M. và nhân viên s\u1ebd có m\u1eb7t \u0111\u1ec3 giúp s\u1eafp x\u1ebfp phòng.<\/p>

Tôi mu\u1ed1n nh\u1ea5n m\u1ea1nh t\u1ea7m quan tr\u1ecdng c\u1ee7a vi\u1ec7c tuân th\u1ee7 ch\u01b0\u01a1ng trình làm vi\u1ec7c vì th\u1eddi gian chúng ta \u1edf bên nhau là có h\u1ea1n. Nh\u1eefng ng\u01b0\u1eddi tham gia cu\u1ed9c h\u1ecdp mu\u1ed1n th\u1ea3o lu\u1eadn thêm v\u1ec1 b\u1ea5t k\u1ef3 ch\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ec1 nào có th\u1ec3 có th\u1ec3 th\u01b0\u1edfng th\u1ee9c b\u1eefa tr\u01b0a sau cu\u1ed9c h\u1ecdp. Tôi s\u1ebd \u0111\u1ebfn Devon’s Sandwich Shop, cách th\u01b0 vi\u1ec7n m\u1ed9t dãy nhà v\u1ec1 phía nam. Hoan nghênh t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 m\u1ecdi ng\u01b0\u1eddi tham gia cùng tôi.<\/p>

Robin Fowler<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Based on the first e-mail, what is most likely true about the Linton Business Alliance?
childrens.answers: ["It opposes a city policy.","It is a new organization.","It charges membership fees.","It is led by city officials."]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

D\u1ef1a trên e-mail \u0111\u1ea7u tiên, \u0111i\u1ec1u gì có kh\u1ea3 n\u0103ng \u0111úng nh\u1ea5t v\u1ec1 Liên minh Doanh nghi\u1ec7p Linton?<\/p>

A. Nó ph\u1ea3n \u0111\u1ed1i chính sách c\u1ee7a thành ph\u1ed1.<\/p>

B. \u0110ó là m\u1ed9t t\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c m\u1edbi.<\/p>

C. Nó tính phí thành viên.<\/p>

D. Nó \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c lãnh \u0111\u1ea1o b\u1edfi các quan ch\u1ee9c thành ph\u1ed1.<\/p>###

Since news about the creation of our Business Alliance is generating interest within the community [...]<\/p>","en":"
